original: @92b ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: @92b ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The Bhagavān has declared this.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas gdul bya rnams kyi don byed cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas gdul bya rnams kyi don byed cing /
translated: Because, by the method of vajra dance, the emanations of the buddhas act for the welfare of those to be trained,

original: sangs rgyas kyi mchod par rab tu rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mchod par rab tu rtogs par byed do //
translated: and they are understood to be the worship of the buddhas.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas rnams dang bdag tha mi dad pa yin na /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas rnams dang bdag tha mi dad pa yin na /
translated: If the buddhas are not different from oneself by the nature of the perfection of effort,

original: de rnams bdag dang tha dad par gyur nas mchod pa byed do snyam pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: de rnams bdag dang tha dad par gyur nas mchod pa byed do snyam pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: it is amazing that they are worshipped by oneself, having become different from oneself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: All the tathāgatas

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: and so forth.

original: 'di rnams kyi sdom gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi sdom gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This is the summary of those.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i rgyun gang yin pa de'i dam tshig ni de'i rang bzhin te sgeg mo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i rgyun gang yin pa de'i dam tshig ni de'i rang bzhin te sgeg mo'o //
translated: The commitment of the stream of unsurpassed bliss and mental joy of all the tathāgatas is the nature of that, which is Lāsyā.

original: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa de'i don gyi phreng ba ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa de'i don gyi phreng ba ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'o //
translated: The garland of the meaning of the consecration of all Tathagatas, which is the absence of afflictions together with their instincts, is the Vajra-garland Goddess.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis tshigs su bcad pa ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin yang dag par glur len pa'i glu ni lha mo rdo rje glu ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis tshigs su bcad pa ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin yang dag par glur len pa'i glu ni lha mo rdo rje glu ma'o //
translated: The song that is the singing of the verses just as they are spoken, by the method of the perfection of wisdom of all Tathagatas, is the Goddess Vajra-song.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa ni gar gyi mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa ni gar gyi mchod pa ste /
translated: The unexcelled worship-action of all Tathagatas is the worship of dance.

original: de nyid ni las su byed pa'i ngang tshul yin pas na mchod pa'i las bla na med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni las su byed pa'i ngang tshul yin pas na mchod pa'i las bla na med pa ste /
translated: That itself is the nature of the action that is done, and so it is the unexcelled worship-action.

original: rdo rje gar ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gar ma'o //
translated: It is the Vajra-dance Goddess.

original: 'di dag ni sems dang ldan pa'i ngo bo yin pas de'i phyir gsang ba'i mchod ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems dang ldan pa'i ngo bo yin pas de'i phyir gsang ba'i mchod ba zhes bya'o //
translated: These are the nature of the mind, and so they are called the secret worship.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i rang bzhin skye ba yin pas /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i rang bzhin skye ba yin pas /

analyzed: rdo rje dbyings thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so //

original: zhes bya ba ni //

analyzed: gang la tshim pa yod pa de ni sim ldan te gang la @93b zag pa med pa'i bde ba mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is endowed with satisfaction, it is satisfied, it is the one who has the bliss of the absence of defilements, is the meaning.

original: zag pa med pa'i bde ba mnga' ba nyid kyis na dge ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde ba mnga' ba nyid kyis na dge ba'o //
translated: It is virtuous because it possesses uncontaminated bliss.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /

original: gang phyir sems can dbang ldan pa //
analyzed: gang phyir sems can dbang ldan pa //

analyzed: bdug spos kyis skyes bu la sogs pa'i lus kyi rgyud kyi nang du lha la sogs pa zhugs pa ni sems can dbab pa'o //
translated: The entry of the gods, etc., into the body continuum of the person who is fumigated is the descent of the sentient beings.

original: des kyang rang dbang med par 'gyur te /

original: de rnams las chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bdag kyang sems dpa' ste sems dpa'i rdo rje babs pas myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: It is amazing that I, the hero, quickly attain enlightenment by the descent of the hero's vajra.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin la /

translated: This BhagavatI holds the sword of correct view in front of the Bhagavat Vairocana, who is seated in the midst of the queens such as the Lady of Charm.🔽Therefore, she is called the attendant.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: bdag byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid yin las na /

analyzed: de la bstan pa'i chos kyi yul la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi spyan te de'i snang ba'i mchod pa'o //

translated: Entering into that means that he is one pointed in his mind, in emanating and creating all the offerings of light, and so on.🔽The messenger of all tathagatas is the vajra light of the Dharma eye as it has been explained.

analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dri'i bkod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: His pledge is the array of all the Tathagatas' scents, and so forth.

original: de 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang yin pa las gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang yin pa las gyur pa ste /
translated: The source of that is the one who is the Bodhisattva-Vajra.

original: de ni dri'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de ni dri'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'o //
translated: That is the Vajra Born of the Pledge of the Worship of Scent.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ste /
translated: The samadhi focused on that is called the Vajra Born of the Pledge of the Worship of Scent of all the Tathagatas.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni dri'i bkod pa la sogs pa sprul zhing bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni dri'i bkod pa la sogs pa sprul zhing bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: Entering into union with that is the one-pointed mind of emitting and generating the array of scents, and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The one who is the female servant of all the Tathagatas

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dag /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dag /
translated: is the one who is the vow of morality, samadhi, and wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dris /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dris /
translated: By the scent of liberation and the vision of the wisdom of liberation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bde bar byed pa las byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na bran mo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bde bar byed pa las byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na bran mo'o //
translated: The Tathagatas are the nature of the performance of the act of bringing about bliss, and so are the maidservant.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The goddess Vajra-Gandha, having become the form of the Vajra-Gandha Goddess, uttered this meaningful expression.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One is the same as the Vajra-Holder, the nature of the Vajra of the Bodhisattva.

original: dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The array of all-perfume-worship is

original: lha dang / mi'i dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / sbyar ba dang / yid kyi rang bzhin can dri @96a * //
analyzed: lha dang / mi'i dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / sbyar ba dang / yid kyi rang bzhin can dri @96a * //
translated: all perfumes of the gods, humans, natural, compounded, and mental.

original: thams cad kyi mchod pa ni dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi mchod pa ni dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
translated: All perfumes are all-perfume.

original: tshad ji tsam zhe na /🔽'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: tshad ji tsam zhe na / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is the measure of it?🔽It is said to pervade all world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams cad du spros shing khyab pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams cad du spros shing khyab pa ste /
translated: It is diffused and pervades all world systems.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'o //
translated: That which has that is pervaded by all the world-realms.

original: lha mo rdo rje dri zhim zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas zhes bya ba ni dris nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo rdo rje dri zhim zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas zhes bya ba ni dris nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: Having become the form of the goddess Vajra-Gandhā, called “Fragrance,”

original: dri'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dri'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: dri'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dri'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the nature of fragrance is the essence of the fragrance as explained.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i dri'i tshul yin pa nyid kyis na lha rdzas yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i dri'i tshul yin pa nyid kyis na lha rdzas yin no //
translated: Since it is the way of fragrance as explained, it is divine.

original: lha rdzas yin pa nyid kyis na yid du 'ong ba ste /
analyzed: lha rdzas yin pa nyid kyis na yid du 'ong ba ste /
translated: Since it is divine, it is pleasing,

original: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: in accord with the mind.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /🔽gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na / gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: What is so amazing about that?🔽It is said, “Because the fragrance of the Tathāgatas’ morality and so on,”

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth. Because the fragrance of the Tathāgatas is morality and so on, as explained.

original: lus rnams kun la zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
analyzed: lus rnams kun la zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
translated: “In all bodies” means in those characterized by the five aggregates.

original: 'byin par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: 'byin par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: The phrase “will emit” refers to the fragrance of the morality of restraint.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: bdag ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
analyzed: bdag ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
translated: “I am the morality, meditative concentration, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and insight of liberation

original: zag pa med pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: of the nature of the undefiled aggregates.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
translated: Therefore, I am the essence of the Tathagata.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi sa bdag tha dad par gyur pa'i dris de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par mthong gi / kho mo ni 'di lta bu ma yin no //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi sa bdag tha dad par gyur pa'i dris de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par mthong gi / kho mo ni 'di lta bu ma yin no //
translated: I see the Tathagata worshipped with the fragrance of the different bodies of the disciples, but not so myself.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The verse on the consecration of the wisdom of all the Tathagatas:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa ni bdug pa ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa ni bdug pa ma'o //
translated: The consecration of the wisdom of all the Tathagatas is Dhupā.

original: byang chub chen po'i yan lag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i yan lag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
translated: The branches of great enlightenment are the seven factors of enlightenment.

original: de rnams kyi bsags pa ni me tog ma'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsags pa ni me tog ma'o //
translated: Their accumulation is Puṣpā.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi spyan ni kun du snang ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi spyan ni kun du snang ba ste /
translated: The Dharma eye of all the Tathagatas is the universal light,

original: de'i rang bzhin ni mar me'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni mar me'o //
translated: and its nature is the lamp.

original: tshul khrims la sogs pa dri'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje byug pa ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pa dri'i rang bzhin ni rdo rje byug pa ma'o //
translated: The nature of morality, etc., is the perfume, and its nature is the unguent.

original: 'di dag ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i g-yog mo la sogs pa'i tshul du gyur pas /
analyzed: 'di dag ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i g-yog mo la sogs pa'i tshul du gyur pas /
translated: These are the nature of the retinue, etc., as stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed ba'o //
translated: They are the doers of the word of all the Tathagatas.

original: byang chub kyi @96b sems kyi lcags kyus thar pa'i grong khyer 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'gugs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi @96b sems kyi lcags kyus thar pa'i grong khyer 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa 'gugs par byed pa ni /
translated: The hook of enlightenment spirit draws the Tathagatas, etc., into this city of liberation.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
translated: Then, etc., teaches this.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The Blessed One emitted this lord of the assembly of seals from his heart.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gi lcag kyu zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la dam tshig gi lcag kyu yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gi lcag kyu zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la dam tshig gi lcag kyu yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu ste /
translated: The expression “all tathāgatas’ pledge hook” means that all tathāgatas are also pledge hooks, and thus all tathāgatas’ pledge hooks.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o//
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o//
translated: The great vajra holder is the bodhisattva vajra-like one.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshul lo //🔽de'i 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul gang las 'di byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshul lo // de'i 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul gang las 'di byung ba'o //
translated: His pledge is the method of all tathāgatas’ seals.🔽Its emergence is the bodhisattva vajra method from which this arises.

original: dam tshig las byung ba yang yin la sems dpa'i rdo rje yang yin pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dam tshig las byung ba yang yin la sems dpa'i rdo rje yang yin pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is the emergence of the pledge and also the bodhisattva vajra, thus the compound.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ste ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de nyid ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sbrul cing bskyed pa'i rnam
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ste ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de nyid ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sbrul cing bskyed pa'i rnam
translated: The samadhi that focuses on that is called the vajra of the sattva born from the commitment, that is, the samadhi that is entered into with that very name.

original: par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “he created the vajra hook and so forth” is that he focused his mind one pointedly on the emanation and creation of the vajra hook and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the mudras of all tathagatas are the great mudra and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs ni mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs ni mnga' ba ste /
translated: The assembly of all the tathagatas’ mudras is the lord,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyas btab par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyas btab par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and the tathagata family was sealed.

original: de'i bdag po ni de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams byin pas de bas na de rnams kyi bdag po ste bdag po de phyung bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams byin pas de bas na de rnams kyi bdag po ste bdag po de phyung bar gyur to //
translated: The lord is the one who bestows the mudras of all tathagatas and so forth by the power of that, therefore he is the lord, and that lord was created.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having become the great bodhisattva Vajra Hook, he uttered this meaningful expression.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having become the entire assembly of all the tathagatas’ seals means that all the seals of all the tathagatas are the great seal and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi tshogs ni 'gugs pa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi tshogs ni 'gugs pa'i tshogs te /
translated: Their assembly is the assembly of hooks.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i phyir tshad med pa'i @97a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i phyir tshad med pa'i @97a * //
translated: Having become the immeasurable assembly of vajra hooks in order to summon the entire assembly of all the tathagatas’ seals,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs su gyur nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs su gyur nas so //
translated: he entered the bhaga of the Vajra Queen.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid de zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid de zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The Blessed One, Vajrasattva himself means the vajra being as previously explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni shar la sogs pa sgor nye bar mdzad cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni shar la sogs pa sgor nye bar mdzad cing /
translated: Inviting all the Tathagatas by means of the pledge means that Vairochana and so forth are placed in the east and so forth.

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the declaration of the special intention, which is the statement of the mental state.

original: yang dag spyan 'dren brtan byed bdag / ces bya ba ni phyogs bcu kun nas spyan 'dren pas na yang dag spyan 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag spyan 'dren brtan byed bdag / ces bya ba ni phyogs bcu kun nas spyan 'dren pas na yang dag spyan 'dren pa'o //
translated: I, the one who invites and stabilizes, means that because he invites from all the ten directions, he is the one who invites.

original: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa ste de ni bdag yin no //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa ste de ni bdag yin no //
translated: Stability is non-division, and that is I.

original: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
translated: What is so amazing about that?

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says because and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir bdag gis spyan drangs shing bkug pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byon te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag gis spyan drangs shing bkug pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byon te /
translated: Because I invite and summon, the Blessed Buddhas also come,

original: dkyil 'khor kun la ston par gyur pa yin no /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun la ston par gyur pa yin no /
translated: and they become the teachers of all the mandalas.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag ni tshul gcig cing thams cad du khyab pa lta bu yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag ni tshul gcig cing thams cad du khyab pa lta bu yin na /
translated: The thought I am of the same nature as all the Tathagatas, and I pervade everything

original: gang gis de rnams dang tha dad pa'i tshul du spyan drangs pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: gang gis de rnams dang tha dad pa'i tshul du spyan drangs pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: is the great wonder, since it is the way to invite them, as if they were different from oneself.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs nas /
translated: Thus, having invited all the Tathagatas with the hook of the Thought of Enlightenment,

original: byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he causes them to enter the mandala with the rope of the practice of enlightenment,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: which is taught by then, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ka ba 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ka ba 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The Blessed One emitted this hook from his heart.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa'i tshul lo //
translated: The commitment of all the Tathagatas is the way of practicing the ten perfections.

original: de nyid ni 'jug pa yin pas na 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'jug pa yin pas na 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the entrance, and so it is called the entrance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa yang yin la /🔽sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa yang yin la / sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: He is the great being who enters into the commitments of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: Thus, he is the great being who enters into the commitments of all the Tathagatas.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje'o //
translated: He is the being-vajra as described.

original: de'i dam tshig ni dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi tshul lo //
translated: His commitment is the method of the assembly of the seals that enter into the commitments.

original: de 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa de ni dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa de ni dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra that arises from that commitment is the vajra that arises from the commitment.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming de skad ces @97b bya'o ;
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming de skad ces @97b bya'o ;
translated: The samadhi that focuses on that is called by that name.

original: / de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa sprul cing bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa sprul cing bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: He is absorbed in that, that is, he focuses his mind one-pointedly on emanating and producing the assembly of the seals that enter into the commitments. This is the meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Supplication for Entering the Seal of All Tathagatas is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The seal of all tathagatas is the great seal of all tathagatas and so forth.

original: de la 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba ste /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'i gsol ka ba ste /
translated: Since it is the supplication for entering that, it is the supplication for entering the seal of all tathagatas.

original: de phyung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de phyung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: That has been extracted.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: Then, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having become the form called the Bodhisattva Vajra Rope, one should connect this with the expression of the purpose.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i don gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i don gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The Assembly of Seals for Entering the Commitment of All Tathagatas is the seal for the purpose of entering the commitment of all tathagatas.

original: zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the seal of the rope.

original: de'i tshogs ni mang po ste der gyur nas byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshogs ni mang po ste der gyur nas byung ba'o //
translated: His assembly is a multitude, and having become that, he arose.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshul lo //
translated: That very Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, is the method of the Bodhisattva Vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jug / ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang gi sgo nas 'jug par mdzad cing ched du brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jug / ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang gi sgo nas 'jug par mdzad cing ched du brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the Tathagatas enter means that Vairochana and so forth enter through their own doors and will proclaim.

original: rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag / ces bya ba ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis na rdo rje zhags pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag / ces bya ba ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis na rdo rje zhags pa'o //
translated: The excellent vajra noose is myself means that because it is characterized by the vajra noose gesture, it is the vajra noose.

original: dam po ni brtan pa ste /
analyzed: dam po ni brtan pa ste /
translated: Excellent means firm.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o ;
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o ;
translated: It is indivisible because it is the essence of the emptiness samadhi.

original: / ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: / ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
translated: What is so amazing?

original: rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang //
analyzed: rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang //
translated: All the particles that exist

original: bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: I will lead again.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thams cad du khyab pa yin la ;
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thams cad du khyab pa yin la ;
translated: The Tathāgatas, by the principle of the wisdom that is equal to space, pervade everything.

original: de las byung ba rnams kyang de'i ngo bo yin pas thams cad du khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba rnams kyang de'i ngo bo yin pas thams cad du khyab pa'o //
translated: And those who have arisen from that are also of the nature of that, and so pervade everything.

original: de bas na de dag thams cad kyang rdul phran du zhugs pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na de dag thams cad kyang rdul phran du zhugs pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, all of them are also present in the atom.

original: de rnams dang bdag tha mi dad na /
analyzed: de rnams dang bdag tha mi dad na /
translated: And if they are not different from the self,

original: gdul bya rnams kyis de dang bdag tha dad par gyur nas /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyis de dang bdag tha dad par gyur nas /
translated: then the disciples, having become different from that,

original: thams cad la khyab pa lta bur 'jug par @98a * //
analyzed: thams cad la khyab pa lta bur 'jug par @98a * //
translated: see that which enters into everything

original: byed pa de ltar mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: byed pa de ltar mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: in that way.

original: de ltar rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug nas rdo rje lcags sogs kyis theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems dral bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis 'ching bar byed do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug nas rdo rje lcags sogs kyis theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems dral bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis 'ching bar byed do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, having caused all the Tathāgatas to enter with the vajra hook, he binds them with the perfection of wisdom, the meditation of the perfection of wisdom that breaks the mind that desires the other vehicles with the vajra chain.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: This is taught by the passage beginning with “Then…”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The Blessed One has extracted this messenger of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: The pledge fetter of all the Tathagatas: the pledge of all the Tathagatas is not to be transgressed;

original: de nyid ni theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems dral bas lcags sgrog go //
analyzed: de nyid ni theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems dral bas lcags sgrog go //
translated: that itself is the fetter, since it is the mind of those who desire another vehicle.

original: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great hero:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis thams cad du khyab pas na sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis thams cad du khyab pas na sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: the great hero is the one who pervades everything with the meditation of the perfection of wisdom;

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: he is the vajra-holder, whose nature is the vajra of the hero.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
translated: His pledge is the seal of the pledge of all the Tathagatas, etc.

original: de'i dam tshig ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa ste /
translated: His pledge is the pledge of the hero-vajra, which is the source of the pledge.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung pa rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung pa rdo rje ste /
translated: That is the vajra of the great being who is the seal of the commitments of all the transcendent lords, arisen from the commitment.

original: ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
analyzed: ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
translated: He entered into and actualized the meditative absorption called by just that name,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya phyung gno //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya phyung gno //
translated: and sent forth the messenger of all the transcendent lords.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa zhes bya ba la ;🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa zhes bya ba la ; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa ni /
translated: As for “the binding of the commitments of all the transcendent lords,”

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis theg pa chen por bcings pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyis theg pa chen por bcings pa'o //
translated: the binding of the commitments of all the transcendent lords is the binding of the Great Vehicle by the meditative absorption of the perfection of wisdom, as it has been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for “the messenger of all the transcendent lords,”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi rnal 'byor gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi rnal 'byor gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnams te /
translated: those who dwell in the abode of their own yoga of all the transcendent lords.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pho nya 'dis thag ring na gnas pa'i dngos po thams cad gzigs pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pho nya 'dis thag ring na gnas pa'i dngos po thams cad gzigs pas /
translated: This messenger of the perfection of wisdom concentration sees all things that are far away.

original: pho nya dang chos mthun pa'i phyir pho nya'o //
analyzed: pho nya dang chos mthun pa'i phyir pho nya'o //
translated: Because it is similar to a messenger, it is a messenger.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen @98b po rdo rje lcags sgrog gi skur gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen @98b po rdo rje lcags sgrog gi skur gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The great bodhisattva Vajra-lock, having become the body, uttered this utterance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mang por gyur nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mang por gyur nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having become a multitude of seals of the pledge of the pledge of all the tathagatas, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i bsdams pa'i phyag rgya ni lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i bsdams pa'i phyag rgya ni lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge of all the tathagatas is the pledge not to transgress. The seal is the seal of the lock.

original: de'i tshogs ni mang por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshogs ni mang por gyur pa'o //
translated: A multitude of those is a multitude.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the vajra-holder himself, etc.

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag / ces bya ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag / ces bya ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
translated: The vajra chain is very tight,🔽means that it is illustrated by the vajra chain mudra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sku ni bdag go //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sku ni bdag go //
translated: The line “I am the firm vajra chain” means that the form of the great bodhisattva Vajra Chain is myself, because it is indicated by the vajra chain mudra.

original: dam po ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: dam po ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: “ Firm” means inseparable.

original: gal te khyed de ltar gyur pa la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te khyed de ltar gyur pa la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If you are wondering what is so amazing about that,

original: 'ching ba kun las grol bas na //🔽sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod //
analyzed: 'ching ba kun las grol bas na // sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod //
translated: the text says, “I am free from all bonds,

original: ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: but I wish to be bound for the sake of sentient beings.”

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pas 'ching ba las grol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / bdag tha mi dad pa yin yang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pas 'ching ba las grol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / bdag tha mi dad pa yin yang /
translated: The thus-gone ones and I are not different in being free from bondage by abandoning the afflictions together with their imprints.

original: de rnams dang tha dad pa lta bu de rnams bdag gis bcings par shes pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang tha dad pa lta bu de rnams bdag gis bcings par shes pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: But it is amazing that I, who am like them, know that they are bound.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gdul byas de ltar mthong gi bdag ni de lta ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gdul byas de ltar mthong gi bdag ni de lta ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: The disciples see it that way, but I do not.

original: 'ching ba 'dis bcings pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes dbab pas rdo rje 'bebs pas dbang du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'ching ba 'dis bcings pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes dbab pas rdo rje 'bebs pas dbang du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Tathagatas bound by this binding are brought under control by Vajra-Adhipaya, by the descent of the wisdom of natural luminosity.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
translated: Then, etc., teaches this.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should understand that the Blessed One brought forth this servant of all the seals.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great being called descent of all the Tathagatas is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa'o //
translated: The Dharma of all the Tathagatas is natural luminosity. The certainty of this is the descent of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa yang yin la /
translated: He is the descent of all the Tathagatas,

original: sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: and he is also a great being.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab ba zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab ba zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: Therefore, he is the great being called the descent of all the Tathagatas.🔽All the Tathagatas means all the Buddhas.

original: thams cad du khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la @99a * //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la @99a * //
translated: Since it pervades everything, it is the heart of all tathāgatas.🔽

original: zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
analyzed: zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
translated: since it pervades all, it is the great being who has entered the minds of all the Tathagatas, the nature of the vajra, the Great Vajra Holder.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa'o //
translated: His pledge is the host of all the Tathagatas' pledges, the seal-impression, etc.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las gyur pa ste /
translated: Its emergence is the vajra being, from which it comes.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming 'di nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming 'di nyid ces bya ste /
translated: The samadhi which has that as its object is also called by that name.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: He becomes absorbed in that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: All the seals of all the Tathagatas are called servants because they have the nature of the great seal, etc.

original: de rnams mnyes par byed pa'i las byed pas bran dang chos mthun pa'i phyir bran zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams mnyes par byed pa'i las byed pas bran dang chos mthun pa'i phyir bran zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called servants because they perform the function of pleasing them, being similar to servants.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having become the body of the vajra descent, he uttered this utterance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having become the assembly of all the tathagatas’ pledge seals, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dbab cing dbang du bya ba'i don gyis phyir phyag rgya ni dril bu'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dbab cing dbang du bya ba'i don gyis phyir phyag rgya ni dril bu'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The pledge seal of all the tathagatas is the bell seal, because it means to bring down and control the pledge of all the tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs der gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs der gyur pa'o //
translated: They became the assembly of seals there.🔽The Blessed One, the vajra holder himself, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i ngo bor sngar bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i ngo bor sngar bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is the essence of the vajra being of the bodhisattva who abides in the mind of all the tathagatas, as was previously taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Descent of all the tathagatas, etc.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed pas dbang du byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed pas dbang du byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par gyur ba'o //
translated: Since the pristine wisdom of natural luminosity is generated, one is brought under control, and this utterance is uttered.

original: rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag / ces bya ba la /
translated: The vajra-descent is the self-firm.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni rdo rje dril bu la bya la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni rdo rje dril bu la bya la /
translated: Vajra-descent is the vajra-bell.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva illustrated by that is Vajra-descent.

original: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Firm is inseparable.

original: gal te khyed de lta bu yin pa la 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te khyed de lta bu yin pa la 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If you are like that, what is the wonder here?

original: gang phyir kun gyis bdag gyur nas //
analyzed: gang phyir kun gyis bdag gyur nas //
translated: Since all have become me,

original: bran du yang ni gyur pa yin //
analyzed: bran du yang ni gyur pa yin //
translated: I have also become a servant.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
translated: This teaches that

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes thob cing sprul pas 'gro ba'i don bya ba la dbang ba nyid thob pas /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes thob cing sprul pas 'gro ba'i don bya ba la dbang ba nyid thob pas /
translated: since one has attained the pristine wisdom of natural luminosity and has attained the power to perform the benefit of transmigrators by emanation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin zhing de rnams bdag dang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa las gdul bya rnams kyis bdag de @99b rnams kyi las byed par mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin zhing de rnams bdag dang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa las gdul bya rnams kyis bdag de @99b rnams kyi las byed par mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: The Lord of all the Tathagatas, whose nature is not different from oneself, is seen by the disciples as performing the deeds of those Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sdom gsungs pa yin te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs na spyan 'dren pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sdom gsungs pa yin te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs na spyan 'dren pa ste /
translated: The pledge is stated, beginning with all the Tathagatas, and so forth.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
translated: The summoner is the vajra hook, since it summons all the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams nyid bzhugs pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //🔽zhugs pa rnams 'ching ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
analyzed: de rnams nyid bzhugs pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o // zhugs pa rnams 'ching ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
translated: The abider is the vajra noose, since it binds those very Tathagatas.🔽The binder is the vajra chain, since it binds those who have entered.

original: bcings pa rnams dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: bcings pa rnams dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: The subduer is the vajra hammer, since it subdues those who are bound.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i spyan 'dren pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i spyan 'dren pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
translated: The doer of the bidding of all the Tathagatas is the one who does the bidding of all of them in the manner of summoning and so forth, as explained.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje sems dpas byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag / rgyal pos spyan drangs /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje sems dpas byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag / rgyal pos spyan drangs /
translated: the king invited them,

original: chags pas rjes su mnyes /
analyzed: chags pas rjes su mnyes /
translated: passion made them happy,

original: legs pas legs so zhes bya bas dgyes par byas /
analyzed: legs pas legs so zhes bya bas dgyes par byas /
translated: excellence made them delighted with “excellent,”

original: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur /
translated: Vajraratna conferred empowerment on them,

original: gzi brjid kyis 'od kyis snang bar byas /
analyzed: gzi brjid kyis 'od kyis snang bar byas /
translated: majesty illuminated them with light,

original: dpal gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar /
analyzed: dpal gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar /
translated: glory applied them to the perfection of generosity,🔽speech established them in the marvelous smile,

original: bzhad pas 'dzum ba rmad du byung ba la rab tu gzhag / chos kyis ting nge 'dzin la sbyor /
analyzed: bzhad pas 'dzum ba rmad du byung ba la rab tu gzhag / chos kyis ting nge 'dzin la sbyor /
translated: Dharma applied them to samadhi,

original: rnon pos de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcad /🔽rdo rje rgyus dkyil 'khor du bcug / smra bas spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyar /
analyzed: rnon pos de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcad / rdo rje rgyus dkyil 'khor du bcug / smra bas spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyar /
translated: sharpness cut their afflictions and secondary afflictions,

original: rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod /
analyzed: rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod /
translated: Vajrakarman made offerings to them with offerings that were not incomplete or partial,

original: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrungs /
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrungs /
translated: and Vajravarman protected them.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba yongs su bskyab pas bsrungs /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba yongs su bskyab pas bsrungs /
translated: He was protected by Vajrayaksha through the protection of the vow.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis grub bo //
translated: He was accomplished by Vajramushti.

original: de nas mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du gyur te /
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du gyur te /
translated: Then, he became the nature of Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, Amoghasiddhi, and Vairochana.

original: rdo rje sems ma ni byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems ma ni byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: Vajrasattva is the method of bodhicitta.

original: rdo rje rin chen ma ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen ma ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Vajraratna is the method of the perfection of generosity.

original: rdo rje chos ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Vajradharma is the method of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdo rje las ma ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis rigs thams cad bsdus pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las ma ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis rigs thams cad bsdus pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Vajrakarma is the method of the perfection of diligence. It should be understood that all families are included.

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan @100a * //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan @100a * //
translated: The goddesses such as Charm are the nature of the perfections of generosity, morality, patience, exertion, meditation,

original: dang ; shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: dang ; shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: wisdom, vow, and means of the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas bcug pa dang / bsam gtan gyis bcings pa dang / byang chub kyi dbab pas dbang du mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas bcug pa dang / bsam gtan gyis bcings pa dang / byang chub kyi dbab pas dbang du mdzad pa yin no //
translated: They are drawn into the city of great liberation by the hook of the thought of enlightenment; they are bound by the noose of the practice of enlightenment; they are bound by meditation; and they are controlled by the descent of enlightenment.

original: re re zhing yang bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / de nas rang gi gnas su zhugs te ched du brjod pa dang / brtan par bsgom par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: re re zhing yang bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / de nas rang gi gnas su zhugs te ched du brjod pa dang / brtan par bsgom par shes par bya'o //
translated: And each one should be known as having been generated, expanded, and dissolved, and then as having entered into its own place and as having been firmly meditated upon.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
translated: From the generation of Vajrasattva

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
translated: The text from “vajra-like” up to “vajra-like absorption” explains the vajra-like samadhi.🔽

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: The text up to Vajrapani teaches the second meditative stabilization called “supreme royal maṇḍala.”

original: 'di dag kyang ri rab kyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul par mdzad pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di dag kyang ri rab kyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul par mdzad pa yin la /
translated: These are emanations of all the Tathāgatas on top of Mount Meru.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The Bhagavān’s complete enlightenment in the Akaniṣṭha realm🔽is for the sake of guiding sentient beings other than Samantabhadra and so on.🔽He manifests emanations in Tuṣita and so on by entering there.🔽This is the emanation body.

original: kun du bzang pa la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir der zhugs pa nyid kyis dga' ldan la sogs par rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa ston par mdzad pa ni sprul pa'i sku yin no zhes bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don bstan
analyzed: kun du bzang pa la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir der zhugs pa nyid kyis dga' ldan la sogs par rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa ston par mdzad pa ni sprul pa'i sku yin no zhes bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don bstan
translated: The meaning of the tantra is taught in this way.

original: pa'i phyir dang gzhung gzhan dag las 'og min gyi gnas las bskyod par mi mdzad do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i phyir dang gzhung gzhan dag las 'og min gyi gnas las bskyod par mi mdzad do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In other texts it is said that he does not move from the Akaniṣṭha realm.

original: de ltar bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par bsgom pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi don bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / gnas pa dang / brtan par bsgom pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi don bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the meaning of the supreme king mandala through meditating on the generation, emanation, gathering, abiding, and stabilization,

original: sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to bless the emanations,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
translated: the text from “then” and so on is stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba ni /
translated: The gathering of all tathāgatas

original: 'dus par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus par mdzad pa'o //
translated: is the assembly.

original: de sngon du 'gro ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pas so //🔽de'i don du rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas la /🔽lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te /
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pas so // de'i don du rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas la / lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te /
translated: The blessing that precedes that is the abiding of the gnosis being.🔽For that purpose, having made the sign of the vajra snap,🔽one should bind the two vajra fists and make the two index fingers into two hooks.

original: rdo rje se gol brdabs pas /
analyzed: rdo rje se gol brdabs pas /
translated: The two hands are crossed in the vajra bond.🔽Having snapped the vajra fingers,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gshegs par gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba 'di rdo rje se gol @100b te ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gshegs par gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba 'di rdo rje se gol @100b te ;
translated: This is the vajra-akṣobhya,

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i sgra mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i sgra mdzad pa'o //
translated: the sound that makes that name.🔽Then, in that very instant,

original: de nas skad cig ma de nyid la ste bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nas skad cig ma de nyid la ste bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: immediately after the invocation,🔽the phrase “in a moment, in an instant”

original: thang cig yud tsam zhes bya ba'i tshig ni 'jig rten pa'i tshig gi tshul du cung zad cig tu nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: thang cig yud tsam zhes bya ba'i tshig ni 'jig rten pa'i tshig gi tshul du cung zad cig tu nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: is a worldly way of speaking, indicating a short time.

original: skad cig tsam de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'jug ste /
analyzed: skad cig tsam de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'jug ste /
translated: “ In that very instant” is used here.

original: gang gi phyir skad cig ma gcig la byon pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig ma gcig la byon pa'o //
translated: Because they arrived in one instant.🔽And that is said:

original: de yang / de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
analyzed: de yang / de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
translated: At that time, all the buddhas,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas /🔽dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas / dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
translated: together with Vajrasattva and so forth,🔽filling all the maṇḍalas,

original: dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: gathered in the maṇḍalas.

original: se gol gyi sgra'i mtshan mas bskul ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: se gol gyi sgra'i mtshan mas bskul ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The invocation by the sign of the snap of the fingers is of all those dwelling in the world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te /
translated: The Tathagatas equal to the atoms of all world systems, together with the many circles of the retinue of Bodhisattvas,

original: skad cig ma de nyid la 'dus par mdzad nas /
analyzed: skad cig ma de nyid la 'dus par mdzad nas /
translated: gathered in that very instant.

original: khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gshegs shing byon la /
analyzed: khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gshegs shing byon la /
translated: They went to the place where the mansion was, and to where the Lord was.

original: gshegs nas kyang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de /
analyzed: gshegs nas kyang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de /
translated: Having gone, they uttered this utterance:

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata pāda vandana karomi.🔽 Having bowed to the feet with this, they uttered this utterance.

original: zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas kyang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bas ni don 'di ston pa yin te /
analyzed: zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas kyang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bas ni don 'di ston pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching of the meaning by all the Tathagatas bowing to the feet.

original: ji ltar bdag cag gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nyid las sems can gyis don la gzigs te ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sprul pa rdzogs par mdzad
analyzed: ji ltar bdag cag gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nyid las sems can gyis don la gzigs te ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sprul pa rdzogs par mdzad
translated: Just as the gnosis beings Vairochana and so forth, who reside in the Akanishtha realm, see the welfare of sentient beings and emanate the Vajradhatu mandala and so forth on the peak of Mount Meru,

original: pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: pa de bzhin du /
translated: in the same way,

original: bsdu bas byon pa rnams kyang thugs gcig pa'o //🔽kun du bang po zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs gcig pa nyid la dgongs nas ;
analyzed: bsdu bas byon pa rnams kyang thugs gcig pa'o // kun du bang po zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs gcig pa nyid la dgongs nas ;
translated: the beings who come through the gathering are of one mind.🔽With regard to the term “Samantabhadra,” it is intended that the body, speech, and mind are one.

original: 'dir rnams par snang mdzad nyid la kun du bzang po zhes bya bar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir rnams par snang mdzad nyid la kun du bzang po zhes bya bar 'dod do //
translated: Here, Vairochana himself is asserted to be Samantabhadra.

original: yang na rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid ni kun du bzang po ste /
analyzed: yang na rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid ni kun du bzang po ste /
translated: Alternatively, great Vairochana is Samantabhadra.

original: de'i spyod pa'i mchog ni mdzes pa'i spyod pa yin pas spyod pa'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de'i spyod pa'i mchog ni mdzes pa'i spyod pa yin pas spyod pa'i mchog ste /
translated: Since the supreme conduct of that is beautiful conduct, it is the supreme conduct.

original: lha sum cu rtsa bdun du lhag par mos pa'i rnam par thar @101a * //
analyzed: lha sum cu rtsa bdun du lhag par mos pa'i rnam par thar @101a * //
translated: The supreme place is the Akanishtha realm, which is the supreme place of the three realms.

original: pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
translated: and in this way, he acts for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
translated: What is so amazing about this?🔽In the center of the wheel of the Tathagatas,

original: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the Tathagata is beautiful.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor lo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor lo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The wheel of the Tathagatas is the wheel of the Tathagatas.

original: bsdus nas byon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: bsdus nas byon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: It is the wheel of the mandala that has come forth by being gathered.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor lo de'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis mdzes shing 'bar bar gyur pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor lo de'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis mdzes shing 'bar bar gyur pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: In the center of that wheel of the Tathagatas, the Blessed One, Vairochana, is beautiful and blazing in the manner of the great mandala of the vajra realm. This is amazing.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin thugs su chud pas /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin thugs su chud pas /
translated: Since he has realized the meaning of all things just as it is,

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin la /
translated: he is the Tathagata.

original: bdag cag gis kyang dngos po thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: bdag cag gis kyang dngos po thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te /
translated: We too are Tathagatas, because we have realized the meaning of all things just as it is.

original: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gcig pu'i tshul gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi yin la /
analyzed: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gcig pu'i tshul gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi yin la /
translated: Whatever is the way of Vairocana and so on is the way of all of them.

original: thams cad kyi gang yin pa ni gcig yi yang de yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi gang yin pa ni gcig yi yang de yin te /
translated: And whatever is the way of all of them is the way of each one of them.

original: thams cad kyang tshogs dang / chos kyi sku dang / 'gro ba'i don gyi bya pas mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang tshogs dang / chos kyi sku dang / 'gro ba'i don gyi bya pas mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all of them are the same in their accumulation of merit, in their Dharma body, and in their activity of benefiting beings.

original: de bas na kho bo cag thams cad tshul 'dis gnas mod kyi /
analyzed: de bas na kho bo cag thams cad tshul 'dis gnas mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, we all abide in this way.

original: gdul bya rnams kyis kun du bzang po nyid gcig pur mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //🔽phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyis kun du bzang po nyid gcig pur mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But it is a great wonder that those to be trained should see Samantabhadra alone.🔽From all the world systems of the ten directions, they gathered together.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus te byon ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus te byon ba rnams so //
translated: They came from all the world systems.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mthus te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mthus te /
translated: By the blessings of all the Tathagatas means by the power of Akshobhya, etc.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sems dang sems las byung ba rnams sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi stobs kyis ye shes rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sems dang sems las byung ba rnams sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi stobs kyis ye shes rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The mind and mental factors of Akshobhya, etc. are the realization of gnosis by the power of the momentum of previous projection.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni dbus na bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni dbus na bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: Having entered Vairochana's heart means the heart of Vairochana in the center.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rang rang gi thugs kar zhugs shing chud par gyur te zhas bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rang rang gi thugs kar zhugs shing chud par gyur te zhas bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Together with the retinue of Bodhisattvas means that each Bodhisattva retinue enters and dissolves into their own heart.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag thams @101b cad kyi thugs las zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag thams @101b cad kyi thugs las zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it will be explained below that from the hearts of all of them...

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas /
translated: From the hearts of all the tathagatas means that having entered into the heart of Vairochana,

original: rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs las /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs las /
translated: from the hearts of Vairochana, Akshobhya, and so forth,🔽they emerge together with their retinue mandalas of bodhisattvas.
