original: rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen ma dang / chos ma dang / las ma rnams byung zhing sbrul te /
analyzed: rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen ma dang / chos ma dang / las ma rnams byung zhing sbrul te /
translated: From the heart of Vairochana, Cittavajra, Ratnavajrī, Dharmavajrī, and Karmavajri emerge and emanate.

original: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so//
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so//
translated: They abide in the manner of Cittavajra and so forth, abiding in the manner of one's own samadhi.

original: mi bskyod pa'i thugs las mi bskyod pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rgyal po dang / chags pa dang / legs pa dang / sgeg mo dang / bdug pa ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / byams pa la sogs pa shar phyogs kyi cha la bzhugs pa rnams byung ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i thugs las mi bskyod pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rgyal po dang / chags pa dang / legs pa dang / sgeg mo dang / bdug pa ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / byams pa la sogs pa shar phyogs kyi cha la bzhugs pa rnams byung ste /
translated: Akshobhya, Vajrasattva, King, Passion, Excellence, Grace, Incense, Hook, and Maitreya and so on, who reside in the eastern quarter, emerge from Akshobhya's mind.

original: sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs so //
translated: They reside in the manner of emanations of Akshobhya and so on, and so they reside in their respective meditative stabilizations.

original: byams pa la sogs pa yang rang rang gi gnas nyid na'o //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa yang rang rang gi gnas nyid na'o //
translated: Maitreya and so on also reside in their respective abodes.

original: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The others should be understood in the same way.

original: ci'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar thams cad zhugs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar thams cad zhugs she na /
translated: Why do all of them enter into the heart of Vairochana?

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to show that Vairochana is the embodiment of all the Buddhas.

original: de'i thugs kar chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste lhag ma gzhan dag kyang byin gyis brlab pa ni /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste lhag ma gzhan dag kyang byin gyis brlab pa ni /
translated: Having entered into his heart, they emerge from the hearts of the Tathagatas, and the rest are also blessed.

original: de'i yan lag gi khyad par du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: de'i yan lag gi khyad par du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: This is in order to realize the special limbs of that.

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par bya'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par bya'i phyir /
translated: And in order to accomplish the desired aim of those who practice the mantra path,

original: dkyil 'khor sprul pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mdzad pa de ltar rjes su spyad par bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sprul pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mdzad pa de ltar rjes su spyad par bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: having emanated the mandala, the Blessed One did as he did, and one should practice in the same way.

original: rgya chen chen po thog med skyes //
analyzed: rgya chen chen po thog med skyes //
translated: The great vastness is beginningless.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgya chen po ste ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rgya chen po ste ;
translated: It is great vastness because it is vast and great.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: The Tathagatas equal to the number of atoms in all the worlds of the three realms reside in the heart of Vairocana.

original: thog med skyes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thog med skyes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase arisen from beginningless means

original: 'di la thog ma yod pa ma yin pas na thog ma med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la thog ma yod pa ma yin pas na thog ma med pa ste /
translated: that this [realm] has no beginning, and thus is beginningless.

original: bcom ldan @102a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan @102a * //
translated: The Bhagavān

original: 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
analyzed: 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
translated: is the Great Vairocana.

original: de nyid las skyes pa ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi thugs ka na sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid las skyes pa ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi thugs ka na sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is arisen from him is thus because all buddhas reside in the heart of a single tathāgata.

original: 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig che zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig che zhe na /
translated: What is so amazing about this?

original: rdul phrar ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdul phrar ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, all atoms, and so forth.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas gcig tu gyur pa nyid thob pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas gcig tu gyur pa nyid thob pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: Having entered into the heart of Vairocana, [the realm] becomes one, and that is amazing.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gdul bya rnams kyis de ltar ma thog gi chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni don dam par gcig pa nyid dang du ma nyid du ma nyid mnga' ba ma yin no//
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyis de ltar ma thog gi chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni don dam par gcig pa nyid dang du ma nyid du ma nyid mnga' ba ma yin no//
translated: Thus, those to be trained should understand that the tathāgatas, whose nature is the ultimate realm, do not ultimately have oneness or manyness.

original: bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, the gathering and consecration, and so forth.

original: ched du brjod pa'i bar gyi gzhung 'dis ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa'i bar gyi gzhung 'dis ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ston pa yin no //
translated: This treatise up to the expression of praise teaches the third meditative stabilization called the king of supreme actions.

original: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa 'di dag kyang ;
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa 'di dag kyang ;
translated: These three meditative stabilizations are also

original: gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las rnam par phye ste /
analyzed: gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las rnam par phye ste /
translated: taught in order to distinguish them from the hard-to-penetrate secret.

original: bstan pa yin pas som nyi mi bya'o //
analyzed: bstan pa yin pas som nyi mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, do not doubt them.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bstan pas /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bstan pas /
translated: Thus, having taught the three meditative stabilizations,

original: rnam par snang mdzad chen po thob pa'i thabs bstan nas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad chen po thob pa'i thabs bstan nas /
translated: having taught the means of attaining Great Vairocana,

original: 'dir dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i thabs la 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i thabs la 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: here, in order to teach the means of entering the mandala and bestowing initiation,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba 'dir sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba 'dir sbyar ro //
translated: Thereupon the Bhagavān, all the tathāgatas, supplicate the great vajra holder with this hundred and eight names.

original: ci'i phyir gsol ba btab ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gsol ba btab ce na /
translated: Why do they supplicate?

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm,

original: ji skad du bstan pa 'di'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bstan pa 'di'o //
translated: which is taught as above.🔽“

original: byin gyis brlab bar zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bri ba'i tshogs yun ring du gnas pa des /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab bar zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bri ba'i tshogs yun ring du gnas pa des /
translated: Consecration” means that the assembly of those who have been initiated into the lineage of the master, who have long remained in the maṇḍala,

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams ji skad du bshad pa'i yongs su bskyab pa la sogs pa 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams ji skad du bshad pa'i yongs su bskyab pa la sogs pa 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir /
translated: and who have attained the result of the complete protection of all sentient beings without exception

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: are the gnosis of the sameness of Vairocana, and so on, of all tathāgatas.

original: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i sems dang / mngon pa shes pa drug ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i sems dang / mngon pa shes pa drug ste /
translated: The mind that observes the dharmadhātu and the six superknowledges

original: de rnams nyid kyi mngon par shes pa ji skad du bshad pa drug ste /
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi mngon par shes pa ji skad du bshad pa drug ste /
translated: are the six superknowledges that are explained.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa @102b thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa @102b thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, the gnosis of the equality of all the Tathagatas, the superknowledges, and the realization of perfect, complete enlightenment

original: de nyid dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: are called the highest success.

original: de dag gi phyir gsol ba 'debs pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi phyir gsol ba 'debs pa yin no //
translated: It is for their sake that the request is made.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin la zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid kun du bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin la zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid kun du bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
translated: The Lord of all the Tathagatas is Samantabhadra, the embodiment of non-apprehending great compassion, the Lord of all the Tathagatas.

original: gang gi phyir 'di las sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis nye bar skye zhing de dag kyang de'i dbang gis 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di las sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis nye bar skye zhing de dag kyang de'i dbang gis 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Because they arise from him by the momentum of previous impulsion, and they function by his power.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One is called the Lord of all the Tathagatas.

original: de yang de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas de'i phyir /
translated: And he is Vajrasattva, the embodiment of them all. Therefore,

original: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says one's own Vajrasattva.

original: de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis /
translated: Moreover, by being naturally luminous,

original: rtag tu gnyis med pa nyid la /
analyzed: rtag tu gnyis med pa nyid la /
translated: it is always non-dual.

original: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Then he says without beginning or end.

original: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin par mdzad de /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin par mdzad de /
translated: By that very fact, he is the holder of the great vajra of the Tathagatas,

original: de'i phyir rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la zhes smos so //
translated: so he says the holder of the great vajra.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa thugs la bzhag ste gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa thugs la bzhag ste gsungs pa'o //
translated: This refers to what is explained below, which is spoken with the mind in mind.

original: gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa'o//
analyzed: gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa'o//
translated: He says he supplicated, meaning he made a supplication.

original: de bsten pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bsten pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Attending to that, he says Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'dir badzra satva zhes bya ba'i tshul ni snying por gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'dir badzra satva zhes bya ba'i tshul ni snying por gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Vajrasattva here is the essence mantra of the term vajrasattva,

analyzed: khyed ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par spro ba ni sems dpa' chen po'o //

original: rdo rje ni 'dir rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'dir rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o //
translated: The “vajra” here is the five-pronged vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul gyis na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul gyis na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
translated: “ All tathāgatas” means all tathāgatas in the manner of the buddhas equal to the atoms of all world systems.

original: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la thog ma kho nar 'khrungs pas na rdo rje dang po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la thog ma kho nar 'khrungs pas na rdo rje dang po'o //
translated: The “first vajra” is the first to be born among the Vajrarāja and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur pa las bskyed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yin pas na kun du bzang po'o //🔽rdo rjes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyag mnga' @103a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur pa las bskyed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yin pas na kun du bzang po'o // rdo rjes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyag mnga' @103a * //

original: bas na phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bas na phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: The “Vajrapāṇi” is the one who holds a vajra-marked hand.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seven epithets.

original: badzra r'a dza zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i snying po'o //
analyzed: badzra r'a dza zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i snying po'o //
translated: Vajraraja is the essence of Vajraraja.

original: sangs rgyas mchog ces bya ba ni de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i las kyi shin tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog go //🔽rdo rje lcags kyu zhe /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchog ces bya ba ni de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i las kyi shin tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog go // rdo rje lcags kyu zhe /
translated: Supreme Buddha is the very same one who is the supreme of all Buddhas, in the action of inviting all Tathagatas.

original: bya ba ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lcags kyu yin no //
analyzed: bya ba ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lcags kyu yin no //
translated: Vajra-ankusa is the very same one who is the hook, which is the seal-sign of that one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Tathagatas is the Tathagata who is the very essence of all Tathagatas as explained.

original: don yod rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i sku'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: don yod rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i sku'i tshul gyis so //
translated: Amogharaaja is the one who is the form of Vajraraja.

original: rdo rje mchog ces bya ba la /🔽rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje mchog ces bya ba la / rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: Vajra-agra is the supreme of all Vajras.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i tshul gyis de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i tshul gyis de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur ba'o //
translated: Vajras are the Tathagatas, and he is the supreme of those, by the method of the four means of gathering disciples.

original: de nyid gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje lcags kyu stsal nas ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: de nyid gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje lcags kyu stsal nas ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the Tathagatas bestow the vajra hook and confer initiation by conferring the name initiation,

original: rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya'o ;
translated: then he is called the vajra summoner.

original: / de ltar mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: / de ltar mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven names.

original: badzra r'a ga zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'o //🔽bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: badzra r'a ga zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'o // bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas bde ba chen po ste /
translated: Vajra raga is the essence of the vajra passion.🔽Great bliss is the great bliss because it is bliss and it is great.🔽Great bliss itself is called great bliss.

original: bde ba chen po nyid la bde ba chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po nyid la bde ba chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: And it is said:

original: de yang / kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni /
analyzed: de yang / kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni /
translated: The bliss that is not accomplished and does not change

original: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
translated: is explained as great bliss.

original: zhes gsungs pas chos bdag med pa'i ye shes ni bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas chos bdag med pa'i ye shes ni bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Thus the pristine awareness of the selflessness of phenomena is great bliss.

original: rdo rje mda' ni zhes bya ba ni de'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mda' ni zhes bya ba ni de'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra arrow is the seal of its sign.

original: dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams dbang du mdzad pas na dbang du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams dbang du mdzad pas na dbang du mdzad pa'o //
translated: “Controlling” means controlling sentient beings according to their lot by the gnosis of omniscience.

original: bdud kyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdud kyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Demonic desire” means

original: bdud kyang yin la 'dod pa yang yin pas na bdud kyi 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: bdud kyang yin la 'dod pa yang yin pas na bdud kyi 'dod pa ste /
translated: that which is both a demon and a desire.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems gsod pas na bdud do //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems gsod pas na bdud do //
translated: It is a demon because it kills the thought of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
translated: It is a desire because it is the very essence of the thought of enlightenment.

original: 'di ni mtshan gcig yin no//
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan gcig yin no//
translated: This is one name.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje chags pa'i sku'i tshul bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje chags pa'i sku'i tshul bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the mode of the body of Vajrarāga.

original: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni spro ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni spro ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: “Great vajra” means by the mode of emanation.

original: rdo rje gzu zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje gzu zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i sgo nas te /
translated: “Vajra hook” means by the sign.

original: de ltar na bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven.

original: badzra s'a dhu zhes bya ba'i mtshan 'di ni rdo rje legs pa'i snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: badzra s'a dhu zhes bya ba'i mtshan 'di ni rdo rje legs pa'i snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: This name “Vajrasādhu” is by way of the essence of Vajrasādhu.

original: sems dpa' mchog ces bya ba @103b ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa yang dag par bskyed pas bla na med pa yin pas sems dpa' mchog go //
analyzed: sems dpa' mchog ces bya ba @103b ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa yang dag par bskyed pas bla na med pa yin pas sems dpa' mchog go //
translated: The “supreme hero” is the supreme hero because he is unsurpassed, since he generates the delight of all the tathagatas.

original: rdo rje mgu ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje mgu pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mgu ba zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje mgu pa'o //
translated: The “vajra delight” is the vajra delight, since it is the seal-sign of just that.

original: dga' ba che zhes bya ba ni mgu ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad bas so ;
analyzed: dga' ba che zhes bya ba ni mgu ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad bas so ;
translated: “Great joy” is the great joy, since it pervades the whole sky with the mode of delight.

original: / rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog / ces bya ba ni /🔽rab dgyes rgyal po yang yin la /🔽rdo rje mchog kyang yin pas /
analyzed: / rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog / ces bya ba ni / rab dgyes rgyal po yang yin la / rdo rje mchog kyang yin pas /

original: rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog ste /

translated: since he is the supreme vajra king of great joy.

original: rdo rje legs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje legs pa'i sku'o //

original: de la rab dgyes ni yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: de la rab dgyes ni yid bde ba'o //

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
translated: He is the “supreme vajra,”

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchog tu gyur pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchog tu gyur pas /

original: rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog / ces bya'o //
analyzed: rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog / ces bya'o //
translated: The name of the Vajra King of Great Delight is🔽Vajra-Delight, and so on.🔽This name, Vajra-Delight, is

analyzed: rdo rje dgyes khyod ces bya ba'i mtshan 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: rdo rje'i don zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba nyid kyis na mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje bzang po'i don te /
translated: The Great Jewel is the Great Jewel because it emanates the Jewel-Seal of the Vajra Jewel, pervading space.🔽The name of the Vajra King of Great Delight is🔽Vajra-Delight, and so on.🔽This name, Vajra-Delight, is🔽from the point of view of the essence of the Vajra Jewel.🔽The meaning of Vajra-Good is the meaning of the best, because of the consecration of all Ones-Thus, and so on.

original: rdo rje rnams kyi don mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyi don mdzes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of Vajra-Space is the meaning of the beautiful of all Vajras.🔽Vajra-Space is the source of the Vajra Jewel, and it is the Vajra Space because it has the light of space.🔽The Great Jewel is the Great Jewel because it emanates the Jewel-Seal of the Vajra Jewel, pervading space.🔽The name of the Vajra King of Great Delight is

analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi 'byung gnas yin pas dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'od mnga' bas na rdo rje nam mkha'o //
translated: Vajra-Delight, and so on.🔽This name, Vajra-Delight, is🔽from the point of view of the essence of the Vajra Jewel.🔽The meaning of Vajra-Good is the meaning of the best, because of the consecration of all Ones-Thus, and so on.🔽The meaning of Vajra-Space is the meaning of the beautiful of all Vajras.🔽Vajra-Space is the source of the Vajra Jewel, and it is the Vajra Space because it has the light of space.🔽The Great Jewel is the Great Jewel because it emanates the Jewel-Seal of the Vajra Jewel, pervading space.

original: nor bu che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' khyab par spros pas na nor bu che'o //
analyzed: nor bu che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' khyab par spros pas na nor bu che'o //
translated: The name of the Vajra King of Great Delight is🔽Vajra-Delight, and so on.🔽This name, Vajra-Delight, is🔽from the point of view of the essence of the Vajra Jewel.

original: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / ces bya ba ni /🔽nam mkha'i snying po yang yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / ces bya ba ni /🔽nam mkha'i snying po yang yin la /
translated: The meaning of Vajra-Good is

original: rdo rjes phyug pa yang yin pas na /
analyzed: rdo rjes phyug pa yang yin pas na /
translated: He is also rich with the vajra,

original: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / ces bya ba ste /
translated: therefore he is Akashagarbha Vajraratna.

original: nam mkha'i snying po'i sku ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid yin par yang dag par brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po'i sku ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid yin par yang dag par brnyes pa'o //
translated: The body of Akashagarbha is truly attained as Akashagarbha himself.

original: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ste /
translated: Vajra garbha is called so by the name consecration of the vajra.

original: de ltar na mtshan drug yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan drug yin no //
translated: Thus, there are six names.

original: badzra te dza zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: badzra te dza zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajratejas is by way of the essence.

original: cher 'ang rab zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: cher 'ang rab zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
translated: He is also greatly radiant, because he possesses light that pervades space.

original: rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyi sgo nas so //
translated: Vajrasūrya is by way of the method of the vajra sun mudra.

original: rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba ni rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od kyi mdangs 'di la mnga' bas na rgyal ba'i 'od de /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba ni rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od kyi mdangs 'di la mnga' bas na rgyal ba'i 'od de /
translated: Jayaprabha is called so because the radiance of the victors is present here.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung @104a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung @104a * //
translated: He is called so because he is born from the wisdom of the equality of space.

original: ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phra rab bsdus pa nyid kyis ni /🔽nge'i mdangs brnyes pas rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phra rab bsdus pa nyid kyis ni / nge'i mdangs brnyes pas rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
translated: The Tathagata called Prakirna-sambhara attained supreme enlightenment because he gathered the accumulations of merit and knowledge.🔽The Victorious One called Jayaprabha attained supreme enlightenment because he obtained the splendor of the Victorious Ones.

original: rdo rje'i 'od zer zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i 'od 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje'i 'od zer ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od zer zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i 'od 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje'i 'od zer ro //
translated: The one called Vajraprabha attained supreme enlightenment because he possessed the light rays of the vajra.

original: gzi brjid che zhes bya ba ni 'geg rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i nyi ma rnam par lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bas na gzi brjid che'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid che zhes bya ba ni 'geg rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i nyi ma rnam par lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bas na gzi brjid che'o //
translated: The one called Mahaprabha attained supreme enlightenment because he possessed the light rays of the sun, equal to the number of atoms in all the world systems.

original: rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i mtshan te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i mtshan te /
translated: The one called Vajraprabha attained supreme enlightenment because he possessed the light rays of the vajra.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, these are the seven names.

original: badzra ke tu zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //🔽sems can don rab ces bya ba ni sems cad rnams tshim par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: badzra ke tu zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so // sems can don rab ces bya ba ni sems cad rnams tshim par mdzad pas na /
translated: The one called Vajraketu attained supreme enlightenment because he is the essence of the vajra.🔽The one called Sattvārtha attained supreme enlightenment because he is the one who accomplishes the aims of sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa 'di la mnga' bas na sems can don rab bo //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa 'di la mnga' bas na sems can don rab bo //
translated: The one called Sattvārtha attained supreme enlightenment because he possesses the accomplishment of the aims of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis na rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis na rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The name “Vajraketu” is so called because of the manner of the seal of the sign, the vajra banner.

original: rab dga' byed ces bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor bas na rab dga' byed do //
analyzed: rab dga' byed ces bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor bas na rab dga' byed do //
translated: The name “Pramodin” is so called because of the certainty of the perfection of giving of all the Tathagatas by means of that very vajra banner.

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na rdo rje chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na rdo rje chen po'o //
translated: The name “Mahāvajra” is so called because of the pervasion of the whole sky by means of the seal of the vajra banner.

original: rin chen dpal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen dpal gyi sku la bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: rin chen dpal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen dpal gyi sku la bya bar bshad do //
translated: The name “Ratnaprabha” is so called because of the explanation of the body of the Bodhisattva Ratnaprabha.

original: rdo rje dbal zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dbal zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas /
translated: The name “Vajravijrmbha” is so called because of the consecration by name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seven names.

original: badzra h'a sa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: badzra h'a sa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The name “Vajrahāsa” is so called because of the essence.

original: bzhad pa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzhad pa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The name “Mahāhasita” is so called because of the great laughter.

original: bzhad pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na bzhad pa che'o //
analyzed: bzhad pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas na bzhad pa che'o //
translated: Since he pervades the whole sky with the mudra of laughter, he is the Great Laughter.

original: rdo rje 'dzum pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyal de skad ces bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzum pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyal de skad ces bya bar bshad do //
translated: The one called Vajra Smile is explained as the mudra of the sign of the Vajra Laughter.

original: phyag rgya de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzum pa la des par sbyor bar mdzad pas na ngo mtshan che zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzum pa la des par sbyor bar mdzad pas na ngo mtshan che zhes bya ste /
translated: Since he is definitely engaged in the smile of all Tathagatas with just that mudra, he is called the Wonderful.

original: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba rnams la ni bzhad pa mi mnga' bar phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba rnams la ni bzhad pa mi mnga' bar phyir ro //
translated: Because those who are without discursive thought are without laughter.

original: dga' zhing rab dga' zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi khams dga' ba dang mgu ba gang la mnga' ba de ni dga' zhing rab dga' ste /
analyzed: dga' zhing rab dga' zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi khams dga' ba dang mgu ba gang la mnga' ba de ni dga' zhing rab dga' ste /
translated: The one called Joyful and Very Joyful is the one who has joy and delight in the realm of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje bzhad pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa'i sku'o //
translated: He is the body of the Vajra Laughter.

original: rdo rje ston zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ston pa 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje ston te 'dzum ba'i khongs su gtogs pa mi dmigs @104b pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i rdo rje nye bar ston ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ston zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ston pa 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje ston te 'dzum ba'i khongs su gtogs pa mi dmigs @104b pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i rdo rje nye bar ston ba'o //
translated: The vajra teacher is the vajra teacher who possesses this, and the vajra teacher is included in the smile, which is the vajra gift of the Dharma of non-apprehension.

original: rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang bskur bas na de'i sgo nas 'di skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang bskur bas na de'i sgo nas 'di skad ces bya ste /
translated: The vajra joy is the empowerment of the name, and therefore it is said from that point of view.

original: de ltar mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seven names.

original: rdo rje chos ni badzra dharmma zhes bya ba'i snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni badzra dharmma zhes bya ba'i snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra Dharma is from the point of view of the essence called vajra dharma.

original: rab dga' de nyid don ni mdzes ba'i de kho na nyid ni de nying don te ;
analyzed: rab dga' de nyid don ni mdzes ba'i de kho na nyid ni de nying don te ;
translated: The meaning of that reality is the beauty of that reality.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i don la 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i don la 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: The meaning of natural purity is said to be like this.

original: rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi padmo'i phyag rgya la bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi padmo'i phyag rgya la bya'o //
translated: The vajra lotus is the lotus seal of the Bhagavān.

original: rab dga' byed ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams shin tu sbyong bar mdzad pas na rab dga' byed do //
analyzed: rab dga' byed ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams shin tu sbyong bar mdzad pas na rab dga' byed do //
translated: The one called Pramodayakarah is Pramodayakarah because he causes the purification of sentient beings through the wisdom of the reality of natural purity.🔽The one called Lokesvara is Lokesvara because he is the lord of the world.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ba la 'jig rten ni sems can gyi khams rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ba la 'jig rten ni sems can gyi khams rnams so //
translated: The world is the realm of sentient beings.

original: dbang phyug ni de'i gtso bo yin bas na rdo rje chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ni de'i gtso bo yin bas na rdo rje chos kyi sku'o //
translated: He is the lord of that, so he is the vajra Dharma body.

original: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya mdzes pa mnga' bas rdo rje spyan no //
analyzed: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya mdzes pa mnga' bas rdo rje spyan no //
translated: The one called Vajranetra is Vajranetra because he possesses the beautiful seal of the vajra eye.

original: rdo rje spyan khyod ces bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje spyan khyod ces bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: The one called Vajranetra is the consecration of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seven names.

original: rdo rje rnon po ni badzra t'i kshna zhes bya ba ste /🔽snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ni badzra t'i kshna zhes bya ba ste / snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajrashatru is called Vajrashatru because he is the enemy of the vajra.🔽He is the enemy of the vajra because he is the enemy of the vajra.

original: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i ngo bo nying yin pas na theg pa chen po nyid do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i ngo bo nying yin pas na theg pa chen po nyid do //
translated: The one called Mahayana is Mahayana because he is the essence of great wisdom and knowledge.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
translated: The Blessed One is Noble Mañjuśrī.

original: rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba ni ral gri'i phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba ni ral gri'i phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas so //
translated: The one called Vajra Sword is so called because of the sword emblem.

original: mtshan chen po zhes bya ba ni ral gris nam mkha' khyab par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan chen po zhes bya ba ni ral gris nam mkha' khyab par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one called Great Mark is so called because of pervading space with the sword.

original: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku mnga' bas so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku mnga' bas so //
translated: The one called Mañjuśrī is so called because of possessing the body of the youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: rdo rje rab tu zab ces bya ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i shes rab zab mo 'di la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rab tu zab ces bya ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i shes rab zab mo 'di la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one called Vajra Profound is so called because of possessing this profound wisdom that is like a vajra.

original: rdo rje blo zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje blo zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: The one called Vajra Mind is so called because of the empowerment of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus, there are seven epithets.

original: rdo rje rgyu ni badzra he tu zhes bya ba ste /🔽snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu ni badzra he tu zhes bya ba ste / snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one called Vajra Cause is so called because of the essence.

original: snying po che zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' khyab par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: snying po che zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' khyab par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one called Great Essence is so called because of pervading space with the wheel emblem.

original: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one called Vajra Wheel is so called because of the wheel emblem.

original: tshul chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis nam mkha' khyab par spros pas so //
analyzed: tshul chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis nam mkha' khyab par spros pas so //
translated: The great way is the way of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, etc. , because it emanates to pervade the sky.

original: rab bskor zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab bskor zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The well-turned is

original: de nyid sems bskyed pa tsam gyis rab tu bskor bar mdzad pas na rab @105a * //
analyzed: de nyid sems bskyed pa tsam gyis rab tu bskor bar mdzad pas na rab @105a * //
translated: the well-turned because it is well-turned by the mere generation of the thought of enlightenment.

original: bskor ro // rdo rje las byung ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskor ro // rdo rje las byung ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra-born is so called because it is born from the vajra of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgro nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgro nas te /
translated: The vajra-essence is so called from the consecration of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven epithets.

original: rdo rje gsungs ba zhes bya ba ni badzra bh'a sha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsungs ba zhes bya ba ni badzra bh'a sha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra-speech is vajra-bhāṣa, because of the essence.

original: rang rig mchog ces bya ba ni mdzes pa'i rig pa yin pas na rang rig ste /
analyzed: rang rig mchog ces bya ba ni mdzes pa'i rig pa yin pas na rang rig ste /
translated: The supreme self-awareness is the self-awareness because it is the beautiful awareness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab po //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab po //
translated: It is the wisdom that follows the sound which has the nature of the four correct individual awarenesses.

original: tshul de nyid kyis na mchog yin pas na rang rig mchog go //
analyzed: tshul de nyid kyis na mchog yin pas na rang rig mchog go //
translated: And because of that very fact, it is supreme, so it is the supreme self-awareness.

original: rdo rje zlos ba zhes bya ba ni ljags kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje zlos ba zhes bya ba ni ljags kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one called “vajra recitation” is by means of the seal of the tongue.

original: rab sgrub sbyin zhes bya ba ni lhags kyi phyag rgya des dngos grub bzang po stsol bar mdzad pas na rab sgrub sbyin no //
analyzed: rab sgrub sbyin zhes bya ba ni lhags kyi phyag rgya des dngos grub bzang po stsol bar mdzad pas na rab sgrub sbyin no //
translated: The one called “granting the supreme attainment” is the one who grants the excellent attainment by means of that seal of the tongue.

original: mi gsungs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung gi sku la'o //
analyzed: mi gsungs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung gi sku la'o //
translated: The one called “unspoken vajra” is in the body of vajra speech.

original: mchog grub pa zhes ba ni rdo rje ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las rang gis dngos grub brnyes pas na mchog grub pa'o //
analyzed: mchog grub pa zhes ba ni rdo rje ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las rang gis dngos grub brnyes pas na mchog grub pa'o //
translated: The one called “supreme attainment” is the one who attains the supreme by means of the vajra tongue from all the tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje gsungs zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsungs zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: The one called “vajra speech” is by means of the empowerment of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //🔽rdo rje las ni badzra karmma zhes bya ba ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no // rdo rje las ni badzra karmma zhes bya ba ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: Thus there are seven epithets.🔽The one called “vajra action” is by means of the essence, “vajra karma.”

original: rab rdo rje'i bka' zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i rdo rje ni rab rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rab rdo rje'i bka' zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i rdo rje ni rab rdo rje ste /
translated: The one called “excellent vajra command” is the excellent vajra, which is the excellent vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi bka' ni bsgo ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bka' ni bsgo ba ste /
translated: Their command is the order,

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
translated: the emanation of the Buddhas and the performance of the aims of sentient beings.

original: de 'di la mnga' bas na rab rdo rje'i bka'o //🔽las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de 'di la mnga' bas na rab rdo rje'i bka'o // las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is the best of the vajra commands because he has that.

original: rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: The action vajra is the one who has the twelve-spoked variegated vajra seal.

original: kun rab 'gro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rjes nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
analyzed: kun rab 'gro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rjes nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
translated: The one who goes everywhere is the one who pervades the sky with the variegated vajra.

original: rdo rje nges pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs rdo rje'i sku'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje nges pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs rdo rje'i sku'i sgo nas so //
translated: The one who is certain in the vajra is the one who is in the body of the variegated vajra bodhisattva.

original: rgya che ba zhes bya ba ni mchod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas na rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: rgya che ba zhes bya ba ni mchod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas na rgya che ba'o //
translated: The one who is vast is the one who is vast because he worships all the Tathagatas with all the offerings without exception.

original: rdo rje kun zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje kun zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: The one who is all vajras is the one who is so by means of the consecration of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven epithets.

original: rdo rje bsrung ba ni badzra raksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung ba ni badzra raksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajra-protection is vajra-raksha, by way of the essence-mantra.

original: brtan pa che zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i las kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: brtan pa che zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i las kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: Great firmness is by way of the method of the effort of action that is completely pure of the three spheres.

original: rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba ni go cha'i phag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba ni go cha'i phag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajra-armor is by way of the seal of the armor.

original: sra ba che zhes bya ba ni de nyid gzhig par dka' ba yin pa'i @105b phyir ro //
analyzed: sra ba che zhes bya ba ni de nyid gzhig par dka' ba yin pa'i @105b phyir ro //
translated: Great hardness is because it is difficult to destroy.

original: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' //🔽zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi mchog kyang yin la thub par dka' ba yang yin pas na /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' // zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi mchog kyang yin la thub par dka' ba yang yin pas na /
translated: Supreme effort is difficult to overcome.

original: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' //
analyzed: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' //
translated: Supreme effort is also difficult to overcome,

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: thus it is called🔽supreme effort is difficult to overcome.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje bsrung ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje bsrung ba'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body of the great bodhisattva Vajra-protection.

original: rdo rje brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: Vajra-effort is by way of the empowerment of name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven names.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin ni badzra yaksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin ni badzra yaksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajra-yaksha is vajra-yaksha, by way of the essence-mantra.

original: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i so sor rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdud thams cad nya bar med dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i so sor rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdud thams cad nya bar med dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Great means of achieving is the great perseverance of the observation of all demons by the perseverance of discrimination of the complete purity of the three spheres.

original: rdo rje mche ba zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje mche ba zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: Vajra fangs is by means of the seal of the fangs.

original: 'jigs pa che zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas so //
analyzed: 'jigs pa che zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par mdzad pas so //
translated: Great fear is by means of the seal of the fangs, since it pervades all space.

original: bdud 'joms zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku la'o //
analyzed: bdud 'joms zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku la'o //
translated: Slayer of demons is in the body of the Bodhisattva Vajrayaksa.

original: rdo rje mi bzad pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas na rdo rje mi bzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi bzad pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas na rdo rje mi bzad pa'o //
translated: Vajra invincible is the Vajra invincible since it terrifies all Tathagatas by means of the seal of the Vajra fangs.

original: rdo rje drag po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje drag po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: Vajra fierce is by means of the consecration of the name.

original: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
translated: Thus there are seven epithets.

original: rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba ni badzra sandhi ste nying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba ni badzra sandhi ste nying po'i sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra-bond is the vajra-bond, because of the essence.

original: rab bsdus nyid ces bya ba ni shin tu bsdus pa'i byin gyis rlob ba'i las mdzad pas na rab bsdus nyid do //
analyzed: rab bsdus nyid ces bya ba ni shin tu bsdus pa'i byin gyis rlob ba'i las mdzad pas na rab bsdus nyid do //
translated: The “supreme gathering” is the supreme gathering, because of the activity of blessing through complete gathering.

original: rdo rje 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra-bond is the vajra-bond, because of the symbolic seal.

original: rab grol byed ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyor bas sgrib pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pas na rab grol byed do ;
analyzed: rab grol byed ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sbyor bas sgrib pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pas na rab grol byed do ;
translated: The “supreme liberator” is the supreme liberator, because of the activity of liberating from all obscurations through the yoga of reality.

original: / rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog / ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi sku'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: / rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog / ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi sku'i sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra-fist is the supreme commitment, because of the body of the great bodhisattva Vajra-fist.

original: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: The vajra-fist is the vajra-fist, because of the empowerment of the name.

original: 'di la mtshan drug go //
analyzed: 'di la mtshan drug go //
translated: This has six names.

original: de ltar na mtshan brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, there are eight names.

original: 'ching ba ni zhes bya ba ni tshig dang don gyi sgo nas sam /
analyzed: 'ching ba ni zhes bya ba ni tshig dang don gyi sgo nas sam /
translated: The “bond” is the bond, because of the word and the meaning.

original: bzlas pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: bzlas pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: By means of repetition and meditation.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na zhi ba'o //🔽rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na zhi ba'o // rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs //
translated: “Peace” is peacefulness, because it is the cause for the exhaustion of all suffering.🔽The consecration of the name of the vajra, etc.🔽The consecration of the name of the vajra, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa mtshan brgya rtsa @106a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa mtshan brgya rtsa @106a * //
translated: is like the consecration of the name of the Great Vajra Holder, etc.

original: brgyad mnga' ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: brgyad mnga' ba de bzhin du /
translated: , which is the possession of the one hundred and eight names.

original: sgrub pa po 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, this practitioner will be consecrated by the Tathagatas.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni gang la yod pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni gang la yod pa'o //
translated: “Whoever” is whoever possesses.

original: yon tan zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi rgyur gyur pas na yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi rgyur gyur pas na yon tan no //
translated: “Merit” is merit, because it is the cause of merit.

original: ming rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: ming rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o //
translated: “By means of the names” is by means of the one hundred and eight names.

original: gang zhig la zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig la zhe na /
translated: To whom?

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po la'o //
translated: To the Great Vajra Holder.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chang pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chang pa'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: “Always” is the application of uninterrupted continuity.

original: dbyangs kyis bstod pas zhes bya ba ni rnal ma nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po la de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: dbyangs kyis bstod pas zhes bya ba ni rnal ma nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po la de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par 'dod pas so //
translated: The praise in song is the natural state, because it is the desire to express the true qualities of Great Vajradhara.

original: de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And also, one becomes like Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: means one becomes like Vajradhara.

original: theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The realization of the Great Vehicle is the Vajra Realm Mandala.

original: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
analyzed: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
translated: Make the Great Way flourish.

original: ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni tshul chen po yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni tshul chen po yin te /
translated: This mandala is the Great Way, because it is the cause for attaining the path of the bodhisattva together with its result.

original: sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcur rgyas shing bskor bar mdzod ces pa'o //
analyzed: sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcur rgyas shing bskor bar mdzod ces pa'o //
translated: Make it flourish and spread in the ten directions, according to the fortune of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
translated: The great wheel of all the Buddhas

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshogs pa 'dir mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshogs pa 'dir mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o ;
translated: This is so called because the assemblies of the Buddhas, Vairochana and so forth, perform this here.

original: / cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par gsol //
analyzed: / cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par gsol //
translated: Please explain the supreme ritual.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i spyod pa'i chog la stos na sngags kyi tshul gyi cho ga khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas cho ga'i mchog ces bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i spyod pa'i chog la stos na sngags kyi tshul gyi cho ga khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas cho ga'i mchog ces bya ste /
translated: The ritual of the Mantra system is superior to the ritual of the Sutra system, and so is called the supreme ritual.

original: gang gi phyir mdo sde la spyod pa rnams bskal pa grangs mang pa gsum gyis mngon par 'tshang rgyab yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mdo sde la spyod pa rnams bskal pa grangs mang pa gsum gyis mngon par 'tshang rgyab yin la /
translated: This is because those who practice the Sutras become fully enlightened after three incalculable aeons,

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: but the Bodhisattvas who practice the Mantra system attain the stage of joy in this very lifetime and become fully enlightened.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The pledge of all the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig go //
translated: The great maṇḍala of the vajra realm is the commitment of all tathāgatas.

original: de 'byung ba ni rdo rje gang las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni rdo rje gang las byung ba ste /
translated: That which arises from it is the vajra, from which it arises.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
translated: In order to consecrate that, he entered the samādhi called by that name,

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs @106b pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs @106b pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: meaning that he focused his mind on teaching the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
translated: Then, means immediately after.

original: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste des na 'di 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir ming la sogs pa kha cig rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ri rab kyi rtse mor sprul pa lta pa'i skal pa dang mi ldan pa yin
analyzed: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste des na 'di 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir ming la sogs pa kha cig rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ri rab kyi rtse mor sprul pa lta pa'i skal pa dang mi ldan pa yin
translated: Because means cause. Therefore, this arising is because some are not fortunate enough to see the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm emanated by the tathāgatas on the peak of Mount Meru.

original: la / de bas na de rnams kyis mthong bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: la / de bas na de rnams kyis mthong bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, they are explained correctly in order to generate the seed of the stage of non-retrogression by seeing them.

original: yang dag par rnam par phye nas rab tu bshad cing bstan pas na yang dag par bshad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rnam par phye nas rab tu bshad cing bstan pas na yang dag par bshad ces bya'o //
translated: Since they are explained correctly, i.e., fully analyzed and taught, they are called “explained correctly.”

original: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “great maṇḍala”

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku'i gsang ba gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku'i gsang ba gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi /
translated: is the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, which is primarily the secret of the body.

original: thugs la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thugs la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the maṇḍala of form, etc., which is primarily the mind, etc.

original: de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa ste /
translated: Since that is supreme, it is the “highest.”

original: gang gi phyir tshe 'di nyid la sa thob par sgrub pa byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshe 'di nyid la sa thob par sgrub pa byed pa yin no //
translated: Because of that, it is the practice that accomplishes the attainment of the stage in this very lifetime.

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
translated: Since it is similar to the vajra realm,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: it is called

original: ri rab kyi steng gi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: ri rab kyi steng gi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: “similar to the maṇḍala of the vajra realm above Meru.”

original: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
translated: What is its name?

original: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags /
translated: It is renowned as the Vajra Realm.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings kyis nye bar mtshon pas na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings kyis nye bar mtshon pas na /
translated: The Bhagavān Vairocana is renowned as the Vajra Realm because he is characterized by the vajra realm of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags //
translated: It is renowned as the Vajra Realm.

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya cher //
translated: The great beings’ great seal,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: langs nas bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: langs nas bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having risen, they surround him with the manner of a dance.

original: ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //
analyzed: ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //
translated: Having come, as is fitting,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so forth.

original: ci rigs par ni 'di yin te //🔽dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas zla ba gcig gam /🔽zla ba drug gam /
analyzed: ci rigs par ni 'di yin te // dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas zla ba gcig gam / zla ba drug gam /
translated: As is fitting, it is as follows.🔽Having obtained the commitments and empowerment, one should practice the spiritual deportment of awareness for one month,🔽six months,

original: lo gcig gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
translated: or one year.

original: de la yang dang po re zhig rang gi sdom pa la gnas pa'i nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus dang / phyi'i khrus kyang ci nus par bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang dang po re zhig rang gi sdom pa la gnas pa'i nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus dang / phyi'i khrus kyang ci nus par bya'o //
translated: In this regard, first of all, one should perform the internal ablution while remaining in one's own vow, and also the external ablution to the best of one's ability.

original: de la sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas shing skyang ba ni khrus gcig go //
analyzed: de la sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas shing skyang ba ni khrus gcig go //
translated: In this regard, the single ablution is that of one who is well-established in the three vows.

original: bshags pa dang ga sol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: bshags pa dang ga sol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is the confession, the sprinkling of lustral water, and so forth.

original: phyag rgya dgrol ba ni gsum pa'o //🔽chu'i @107a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya dgrol ba ni gsum pa'o // chu'i @107a * //
translated: The third is the releasing of the seals.

original: khrus ni bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: khrus ni bzhi pa ste /
translated: The fourth is the ablution with water.

original: 'di dag dang gos gsum pa brje bar yang bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag dang gos gsum pa brje bar yang bya'o //
translated: One should also change the three robes.

original: de la sdom pa rnams la gnas pa ni gos dang po'o //
analyzed: de la sdom pa rnams la gnas pa ni gos dang po'o //
translated: In this regard, the first robe is that of one who is well-established in the vows.

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is that of one who is endowed with a sense of shame and decency.

original: phyi gos gtsang ma ni gsum pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: phyi gos gtsang ma ni gsum pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
translated: The third is the clean outer robe.

original: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Then, after performing the preliminary obeisance, and so forth,

original: nyin re zhing sdom pa gzung ba yang lan drug tu bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re zhing sdom pa gzung ba yang lan drug tu bya'o //
translated: one should take the vow daily six times.

original: de nas sdog pa dral ba dang phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sdog pa dral ba dang phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
translated: Then, having untied the knot and released all the seals, one should perform the great yoga.

original: de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the maṇḍala at the heart as before.

original: yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas bsdu ba byas la /
analyzed: yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas bsdu ba byas la /
translated: Alternatively, one who possesses the great yoga, having meditated on the supreme royal maṇḍala of the first union, should perform the dissolution.

original: phyag 'tshal ba dang ched du brjod pa dang / rang gi snying gar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par lhag par mos pa yang byas nas /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba dang ched du brjod pa dang / rang gi snying gar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par lhag par mos pa yang byas nas /
translated: Having paid homage, made the declaration, and also imagined that all tathāgatas reside in one’s heart,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas nas ched du brjod pa chen du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas nas ched du brjod pa chen du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine that the bodhisattvas emerge from the hearts of all tathāgatas, abide in their own samādhi, and utter the great declaration.

original: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang nga skur ba la sogs pa dbang bskur ba thams cad blangs la /
analyzed: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang nga skur ba la sogs pa dbang bskur ba thams cad blangs la /
translated: Then, the yogī/nī who has become one with glorious Vajrasattva should receive all the empowerments, such as the garland empowerment, from all the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas nas /
translated: Having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled all those tathāgatas with the vajra hook and so forth,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: they should be accomplished with the pledge seals.

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
translated: Then, having sealed them with the great seal of dharma and karma, and conferred empowerment,

original: phrin las rnams la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: phrin las rnams la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: they should be definitely applied to the activities.

original: de la dang po re zhig rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag chen po bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par mdzod cig ces rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o ;
analyzed: de la dang po re zhig rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag chen po bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par mdzod cig ces rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o ;
translated: To that end, first, having bound the great seal of Vairocana, one should definitely apply oneself to one’s activity, saying, “Gather all the buddhas into one!”

original: / de bzhin du sems ma dang / rin po che dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje mas rigs thams cad bsdus par rgyas gdab par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / mi bskyod pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzod cig / rin chen 'byung ldan la @107b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: / de bzhin du sems ma dang / rin po che dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje mas rigs thams cad bsdus par rgyas gdab par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / mi bskyod pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzod cig / rin chen 'byung ldan la @107b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: With Ratnasaṃbhava, perfect the perfection of generosity.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
translated: With Amitābha, perfect the perfection of wisdom.🔽With Amoghasiddhi, perfect the perfection of diligence of all the Tathāgatas.🔽With Vajrasattva, establish all the Tathāgatas in the mind of enlightenment.

original: don yod par grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / rdo rje rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang pa dang /
analyzed: don yod par grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / rdo rje rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang pa dang /
translated: With Vajrarāja, invite all the Tathāgatas.
