original: chags pas rjes su mnyes par mdzod cig / legs pas legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzod cig / rin chen gyis dbang bskur bar mdzod cig / nyi mas nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzod cig / rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
analyzed: chags pas rjes su mnyes par mdzod cig / legs pas legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzod cig / rin chen gyis dbang bskur bar mdzod cig / nyi mas nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzod cig / rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
translated: Illuminate with the light of the sun.🔽Establish with the victory banner.🔽Establish with the smile.

original: la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / bzhad pas 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / chos kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / rnon pos sems can gyi nyon mongs pa
analyzed: la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / bzhad pas 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la rab tu gzhag par mdzod cig / chos kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / rnon pos sems can gyi nyon mongs pa
translated: Establish with the Dharma.🔽Sever with the sharp weapon.🔽Establish with the wheel.🔽Establish with the speech.

original: dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod par mdzod cig /'khor los de rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs par mdzod cig / smra bas spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor bar mdzod cig / rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod
analyzed: dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod par mdzod cig /'khor los de rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs par mdzod cig / smra bas spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor bar mdzod cig / rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod
translated: Offer with vajra activity.

original: par mdzod cig / srung bas theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems nyid las rjes su srungs shig / gnod sbyin srung ba yongs su bskyangs pas de rnams yongs su srungs shig / khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur sgrubs shig ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: par mdzod cig / srung bas theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems nyid las rjes su srungs shig / gnod sbyin srung ba yongs su bskyangs pas de rnams yongs su srungs shig / khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur sgrubs shig ces bya ba dang /
translated: Make the mudra of the tathāgatas!

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa la /
translated: To the goddesses such as Lāsyā,🔽 you should definitely connect them to the perfections of generosity, morality, patience, diligence, concentration, wisdom, aspiration, and method!🔽 With the vajra hook, hook all tathāgatas with the hook of bodhicitta into the city of great liberation!🔽 With the noose, lead them into the conduct of bodhicitta!

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de rnams nges par sbyor cig / rdo rje lcags kyus byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug par mdzod cig / zhags pas byang chub kyi spyod pa'i🔽zhags pas gzhug tu gsol /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de rnams nges par sbyor cig / rdo rje lcags kyus byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug par mdzod cig / zhags pas byang chub kyi spyod pa'i🔽zhags pas gzhug tu gsol /
translated: With the chain, bind them to the great bliss of the tathāgatas!🔽 With the bell, make the sound of the bell of the Dharma of the tathāgatas!

original: lcags sgrog gi theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dral ba dang / @108a * //
analyzed: lcags sgrog gi theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dral ba dang / @108a * //
translated: The other iron hook vehicle is the request to all the Tathagatas to liberate the mind of desire.

original: shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin ba'i bsam gtan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing du gsol //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin ba'i bsam gtan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing du gsol //
translated: The request to all the Tathagatas to bind with the concentration of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The request to all the Tathagatas to descend with the descent of the natural luminosity and non-arising.

original: 'bebs pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / byangs pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya'o //🔽thams cad du thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: 'bebs pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang / byangs pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya'o // thams cad du thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: The request to protect the city of the sublime Dharma with the melody and so forth.

original: rang gi phrin las la des par sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi phrin las la des par sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that one should bind each one’s own great seal everywhere and always, and one should apply oneself to one’s own activity.

original: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba byas te /
analyzed: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba byas te /
translated: Having thus contemplated the supreme king of activities, one should gather with the yoga of Vajrasattva.

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
translated: Having praised with the one hundred and eight names,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba byas la /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba byas la /
translated: having done the summoning, inducting, binding, and controlling just as they are,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang / phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang / phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: having done the dispelling of obstacles, binding the directions, and so forth with Vajrayakṣa,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
translated: having closed the door with Vajramuṣṭi,

original: rdo rje go chas srung ba thams cad yang dag par srungs la /
analyzed: rdo rje go chas srung ba thams cad yang dag par srungs la /
translated: having guarded all the guards with Vajravarman,

original: mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: mchod yon phul nas /
translated: having offered the welcome water,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
translated: having sealed with the four seals of all the tathāgatas, and having conferred the empowerment,

original: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang / yid kyis mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang legs par mchod la /
analyzed: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang / yid kyis mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang legs par mchod la /
translated: having made offerings with all the outer articles and with the sixteen offerings of the goddesses such as Lalitā and so forth as mentioned in the action maṇḍala, and having made mental offerings, and having made offerings with all the special offerings,

original: phyag bzhi byas nas /
analyzed: phyag bzhi byas nas /
translated: having made four prostrations,

original: badzra a'atma ko& ham /🔽sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
analyzed: badzra a'atma ko& ham / sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
translated: vajra-atmako ’ham🔽svabhava-suddhô ’ham

original: sarbba sa mo& ham /
analyzed: sarbba sa mo& ham /
translated: sarva-samo ’ham

original: zhes rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: zhes rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on this,

original: badzra sa tva zhes brjod la /
analyzed: badzra sa tva zhes brjod la /
translated: one should recite vajra-sattva and

original: thams cad kyang bdag kho na yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyang bdag kho na yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
translated: meditate on the thought “I am all of them.”

original: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstod la /🔽de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstod la / de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Then, having praised with the one hundred and eight names,🔽one should make offerings in the same way,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag byas nas /🔽phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la dbang bskur te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag byas nas / phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la dbang bskur te /
translated: and having made prostrations in the same way,🔽one should release the seals, confer the empowerment,

original: go cha bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos kyang mnyes par byas la /
analyzed: go cha bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos kyang mnyes par byas la /
translated: and having donned the armor, one should please with the gesture of equanimity.

original: badzra sa tva zhes bya ba dang / yi ge brgya ba yang brjod la /
analyzed: badzra sa tva zhes bya ba dang / yi ge brgya ba yang brjod la /
translated: Reciting vajra-sattva and the hundred-syllable mantra,

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dpa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul lo //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dpa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul lo //
translated: one should dedicate the roots of virtue for the sake of the desired spiritual powers, and offer a libation.

original: slar byon ba'i phyir bskul te gshegs @108b su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: slar byon ba'i phyir bskul te gshegs @108b su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Requesting their departure, one should request them to leave.

original: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas /
translated: Then, having protected oneself with Vajra Protection, Vajra Yakṣa, and Vajra Fist,

original: mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o //
analyzed: mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o //
translated: one should perform the activities such as the stūpa rite.

original: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should complete the vidyā conduct by means of the four sessions every day.

original: de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba ni /
translated: Having completed it in that way, one should draw the maṇḍala.

original: gtsug lag khang ngam /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang ngam /
translated: In a temple,

original: kun dga' ra ba'am /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'am /
translated: in a pleasure grove,

original: grong ngam / grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun par /
analyzed: grong ngam / grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun par /
translated: in a town, or in the northeast direction of a city, in a place that is agreeable,

original: shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa /
analyzed: shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa /
translated: very even and smooth,

original: shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa /🔽tshva sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
analyzed: shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa / tshva sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
translated: sloping to the east, very well proportioned,🔽in a place that is free of saltpeter, the king should draw a maṇḍala one hundred cubits or fifty cubits in size.

original: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: A minister or a great minister should draw a maṇḍala twenty-five cubits in size.

original: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de'i phyed do //
analyzed: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de'i phyed do //
translated: The merchant or caravan leader should be twenty-five cubits or half that.

original: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o //
translated: The practitioner should be twelve cubits or six.

original: de la dang po re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi chogs dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog nas /
analyzed: de la dang po re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi chogs dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog nas /
translated: There, first of all, in the center of the desired maṇḍala ground, one should ward off the obstructors of the maṇḍala with the rite of the burnt offering of the fierce fire.

original: bdag dang / slob ma dang / sa bdag la sogs ba zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dang / slob ma dang / sa bdag la sogs ba zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: Then one should perform the burnt offering of pacification that pacifies oneself, the disciples, the lord of the ground, and so forth.

original: de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya'o //🔽'dom gang tsam la lkog ma 'am /
analyzed: de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya'o // 'dom gang tsam la lkog ma 'am /
translated: Then one should have the ground prepared.🔽One should dig one cubit down,

original: lte pa'am ; pus mo nu btsam du 'og tu brkos la /🔽spos chu dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
analyzed: lte pa'am ; pus mo nu btsam du 'og tu brkos la / spos chu dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
translated: or to the level of the collar bone, navel, or knee,🔽fill it with the earth of the fragrant incense water,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /🔽'thas par bcags la /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste / 'thas par bcags la /
translated: sprinkle it with the fragrant incense water,

original: shin tu mnyam par byas te /
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par byas te /
translated: and level it well.

original: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
analyzed: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
translated: It is filled with multistoried buildings,

original: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la sgo bzhi dang ldan ba skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
analyzed: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la sgo bzhi dang ldan ba skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
translated: adorned with four arched gates, and has four doors and windows all around.

original: mtha' ma dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / bla re mchog sna tshogs bres pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
analyzed: mtha' ma dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / bla re mchog sna tshogs bres pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
translated: It is beautified by hanging canopies and banners with attached bells, and by various excellent canopies.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grva bzhir gzhags pa'i spos snod rnams las spos legs par 'thul ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grva bzhir gzhags pa'i spos snod rnams las spos legs par 'thul ba /
translated: It is adorned with ornaments such as paintings of precious buddhas and statues, and in the four corners, incense burners emit incense.🔽Having beautified the area with flowers, lamps, and other articles such as clothing, and having anointed the ground with saffron water,

original: me tog dang / mar me dang / gos la sogs pa'i yo byang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i sa'i cha dris nye bar byugs nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsangs la /🔽sa @109a * //
analyzed: me tog dang / mar me dang / gos la sogs pa'i yo byang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i sa'i cha dris nye bar byugs nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsangs la / sa @109a * //
translated: one should purify with incense water incanted with Vajrayaksha.

original: la lag pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: la lag pa bzhag ste /
translated: Placing one's hand on the ground,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
translated: one should recite the seven-syllable mantra of Vajrasattva seven times.

original: sa sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: sa sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: The ritual of purifying and taking possession of the ground.

original: de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhi ma pos byugs la /
analyzed: de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhi ma pos byugs la /
translated: Then, having bathed oneself, and having anointed one's body with perfume,

original: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing /
analyzed: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing /
translated: one should put on as much clothing and ornaments as one has.

original: shin tu dmar ba'i ras gos bgo ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim por byas la /
analyzed: shin tu dmar ba'i ras gos bgo ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim por byas la /
translated: Wearing very red clothing, putting on a garland of flowers, and making one's face fragrant,

original: yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te /🔽tshes bcu'am / bcu gsum mam /
analyzed: yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te / tshes bcu'am / bcu gsum mam /
translated: beginning on the eighth day of the waxing moon,🔽on the tenth, the thirteenth,

original: bcu bzhi nas brtsams te /🔽bco lnga'i bar du'am /
analyzed: bcu bzhi nas brtsams te / bco lnga'i bar du'am /
translated: or the fourteenth,🔽beginning on the fifteenth,

original: tshes lnga'i snga dro'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te /
analyzed: tshes lnga'i snga dro'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te /
translated: or beginning on the morning of the fifth day,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o //
translated: one should perform the mandala rite.

original: de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyang nul la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyang nul la sogs pa byas la /
translated: With regard to that, one should sweep and sprinkle the ground where one will be staying,

original: de bzhin du lag pa sa la reg par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lag pa sa la reg par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
translated: and likewise, having touched the ground with one's hand, one should recite the Vajrasattva mantra and the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
translated: Then, sitting in the center of the mandala ground,

original: bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: One should protect oneself and destroy obstructors and so forth.

original: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
translated: Then, with the vajra wheel gesture, one should emanate the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang rnal 'byor chen po dang / gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed la /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang rnal 'byor chen po dang / gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed la /
translated: After the preliminary prostrations, one should generate the great yoga of taking the vows and the celestial mansion with the seats.

original: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
translated: One should sit in the bodhisattva posture.

original: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
analyzed: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
translated: Today my life bears fruit.

original: ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas /
translated: Up to:

original: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
analyzed: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
translated: Today I am the supreme assembly.

original: zhes bya ba'i par gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i par gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed bar bya'o //
translated: One should generate enthusiasm with those words.

original: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
analyzed: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
translated: Then, after prostrating with all limbs,

original: spos smod lag tu thogs te /
analyzed: spos smod lag tu thogs te /
translated: one should hold incense in one’s hand🔽and invite all buddhas with the words:

original: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
analyzed: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
translated: All those who reside in the limitless directions,

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: up to:

original: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //🔽zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //🔽zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: Please grant the spiritual powers.

original: de nas yang dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog rnams bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas yang dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog rnams bsgoms la /
translated: Then, having first meditated on the Supreme King of Mandalas and the Supreme King of Ritual Actions,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po gnas shing /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po gnas shing /
translated: one should abide in the great seal of glorious Vajrasattva in the abode of Vajrasattva.

original: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlo sa pa la brtson pa la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri pa'i phyir /
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlo sa pa la brtson pa la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri pa'i phyir /
translated: One should strive in the repetition of Oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ, and for the sake of drawing the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm,

original: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa @109b brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa @109b brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should request with the one hundred and eight names the supreme friend in the practice who has the pride of the tathāgatas.

original: de ltar na 'di ni ci rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni ci rigs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, this is appropriate.

original: tshul 'dis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug pa las langs nas yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul 'dis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug pa las langs nas yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
translated: One should rise from the sattva posture and circumambulate.

original: 'on te spros par 'dod na spros pa dang bcas pa'i skyor ba nyid bya bar shes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te spros par 'dod na spros pa dang bcas pa'i skyor ba nyid bya bar shes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to elaborate, one should understand that the recitation with elaboration should be done.

original: sems dpa' chen po ni phyag rgya cher bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing zhes bya ba ni de nas gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po ni phyag rgya cher bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing zhes bya ba ni de nas gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
translated: Then, immediately after the supplication,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
translated: one should imagine that all the tathāgatas fill space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la /
translated: One should pay homage to all the tathāgatas with the five maṇḍalas.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Forming the great seal of Bhagavān Vajrasattva,

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /🔽bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste / bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
translated: one should say this:🔽I myself am the vajra holder,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
translated: I myself am Vajrasattva,

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
translated: I am the great king of buddhas,

original: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
analyzed: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
translated: I myself am the powerful vajra holder,

original: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
analyzed: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
translated: I am the lord of yogins,

original: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
translated: I am the firm Vajrapāṇi.🔽I am the great lord of vajra masters,

original: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis rlob pa mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis rlob pa mi 'dor ro //
translated: I do not abandon the consecration.

original: aom badzra satva h'um //
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um //
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji ltar yongs su bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor bteg ste nam mkhar bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji ltar yongs su bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor bteg ste nam mkhar bzhag la /
translated: Then, with the pledge seal of Vajrasattva, lift up the mandala as it was visualized and place it in the sky.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: With that very pledge seal of Vajrasattva, repeat vajrasattva and empower yourself.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
translated: Generate the pride of being Vajrasattva.

original: badzra dri shti mata ces bya ba nig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: badzra dri shti mata ces bya ba nig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: With the words vajra-dhrk mat, place the two feet.

original: aa zhes bya bas rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
analyzed: aa zhes bya bas rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
translated: With the word a, generate a variegated vajra at the two feet.

original: yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen bor bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen bor bsam par bya'o //
translated: Again, imagine the great seal of the Blessed One, Vajrasattva.

original: 'di tsam gyis ni /🔽sems dpa' che yi phyag rgya cher //🔽sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing //
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis ni / sems dpa' che yi phyag rgya cher // sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing //
translated: By just this much,

original: zhes pa 'di'i don ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di'i don ston pa yin no //
translated: the meaning of this is taught:🔽Meditating on the great seal🔽of the great being, I empower myself.

original: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
analyzed: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
translated: Standing in the seal, standing like that,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen mo ma bkrol bas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bshig la langs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen mo ma bkrol bas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bshig la langs te /
translated: This is because the great seal is not released, the bodhisattva posture is destroyed, and one stands up.

original: phyag rgyas gnas pas na phyag rgya la gnas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyag rgyas gnas pas na phyag rgya la gnas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since one abides in the seal, it is called “abiding in the seal.”

original: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: One abides in the great seal itself.

original: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
analyzed: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
translated: Having looked all around,

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning from the northeast,

original: g-yon phyogs nas bltas pas bgegs bskrad par byas la /
analyzed: g-yon phyogs nas bltas pas bgegs bskrad par byas la /
translated: one should expel obstructors by looking from the left.

original: yang @110a * //
analyzed: yang @110a * //
translated: Then,

original: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs nas bltas nas phyogs mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor nam mkha' dang sa bcing ba dang ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs nas bltas nas phyogs mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor nam mkha' dang sa bcing ba dang ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
translated: having looked from the right, one should bind the directions, the maṇḍala, the sky, and the earth with a fence and a net.

original: rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzang bas sa bzhi brtan pa nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byed cing ;
analyzed: rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzang bas sa bzhi brtan pa nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byed cing ;
translated: Having made the earth from the firm base of the four continents up to the top of Meru the nature of a vajra with the soles of one’s feet,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: one should form the great seal of Vajrasattva.

original: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing g-yas phyogs nas yongs su bskor nas /
analyzed: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing g-yas phyogs nas yongs su bskor nas /
translated: Endowed with that pride, one should recite vajrasattva hūṃ, and circumambulate the maṇḍala clockwise.

original: yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba nas /
analyzed: yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba nas /
translated: Then, one should perform the rite of subduing the obstructors, and so forth, in the manner explained in the maṇḍala rite,

original: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: and one should perform the rite of consecration.

original: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkhar zhag la thig gis thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkhar zhag la thig gis thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, at sunrise, one should draw the maṇḍala in the sky with that very samaya mudra.

original: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
analyzed: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
translated: “New” means not previously used for another maṇḍala.

original: legs par bkal nas kyang zhes bya ba ni dris byug pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du gzhag go //
analyzed: legs par bkal nas kyang zhes bya ba ni dris byug pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du gzhag go //
translated: “Having well-spread” means having placed it in a container of gold, and so forth, that has been anointed.

original: tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor khru drug pa la sboms su mthe'u chung gi tshad la chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor khru drug pa la sboms su mthe'u chung gi tshad la chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis so //
translated: “Having the right size” means that the maṇḍala is six cubits, and the thread is the size of the little finger, and the length is double the size of the maṇḍala.

original: mdzes pa'i thig gis zhes bya ba ni tshon sna lnga pos lta na sdug pa'i thig gis thig gang ba pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i thig gis zhes bya ba ni tshon sna lnga pos lta na sdug pa'i thig gis thig gang ba pa'o //
translated: The beautiful lines are the lines drawn with the five colors, which are pleasing to behold.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang dbyibs dang bya ba la sbyang ba'o //🔽ci nus kyis zhes bya ba ni tshad dpag tshad nas brtsams te /
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang dbyibs dang bya ba la sbyang ba'o // ci nus kyis zhes bya ba ni tshad dpag tshad nas brtsams te /
translated: The skilled are those who are trained in the colors, shapes, and actions of the maṇḍala.

original: khru drug pa'i tshad kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du nus pa'i tshad las dpags te /
analyzed: khru drug pa'i tshad kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du nus pa'i tshad las dpags te /
translated: The to the best of one's ability means that the size of the maṇḍala should be estimated based on one's ability, starting from a league up to six cubits.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gis gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gis gdab par bya'o //
translated: The maṇḍala should be drawn to that size.🔽Having four corners and four doors,

original: grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // zhes bya ba ni shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i ngos kyi ri mos zur bzhir bya pa'i phyir gru bzhi'o //
analyzed: grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // zhes bya ba ni shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i ngos kyi ri mos zur bzhir bya pa'i phyir gru bzhi'o //
translated: Four corners means that the east, west, north, and south sides are made into four corners by lines.

original: sgo bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos kyi dbus su re re zhing sgo btod pa yod de des na sgo bzhi'o //
analyzed: sgo bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos kyi dbus su re re zhing sgo btod pa yod de des na sgo bzhi'o //
translated: Four doors means that in the center of the east, south, west, and north sides, each with a door opening, there are four doors.

original: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
analyzed: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
translated: Adorned with four archways,

original: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
translated: The meaning is clear.

original: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
translated: Endowed with four lines,

original: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang mtshams kyi tig gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang mtshams kyi tig gnyis te /
translated: two lines of Brahmā and two lines of the intermediate directions.

original: de dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa ni mnyam por bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //🔽dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: de dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa ni mnyam por bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
translated: Endowed with those, up to: in order to make it even.🔽Adorned with silk and flower garlands,

original: zhes bya ba ni dar gyi phreng ba dang / @110b me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dar gyi phreng ba dang / @110b me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
translated: adorned with silk streamers and flower garlands.🔽In all the corners and

original: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
translated: in the intermediate directions of the door surrounds,🔽the outer enclosure of the maṇḍala

original: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //🔽dkyil 'khor phyi ri thig gdab bo //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni // dkyil 'khor phyi ri thig gdab bo //
translated: is marked with vajra jewels.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor grva'i phyogs bzhi char du yang zla ba phyed pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor grva'i phyogs bzhi char du yang zla ba phyed pa /
translated: In all four directions of the maṇḍala corners, a half-moon

original: de'i steng du rdo rje rin chen yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje rin chen yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: above which there is a vajra jewel.

original: sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de //
analyzed: sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de //
translated: The door surrounds are the door frames.

original: de rnams kyi mtshams ni ri mo gnyis phrad pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshams ni ri mo gnyis phrad pa'i tshul te /
translated: The boundaries of those are in the manner of two lines meeting.

original: de rnams su yang zla ba phyed pa'i steng du rdo rje'i na po che yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams su yang zla ba phyed pa'i steng du rdo rje'i na po che yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: And on top of those half-moons, one should lay down the lines of the vajra-pillars.

original: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
analyzed: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
translated: Having entered the interior of that🔽one should lay down the mandala in the manner of a wheel.

original: 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la //
translated: Having entered the interior of that outer mandala,

original: 'khor lo 'dra bar dkyil 'khor gyi gnas gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba la rta babs med par thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'dra bar dkyil 'khor gyi gnas gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba la rta babs med par thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: in the manner of a wheel, in the places of the mandala, in the four corners, with four gates, and so on, as explained, similar to the outer mandala, without the archways, one should lay down the lines.

original: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
analyzed: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
translated: Surrounded by vajra lines.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
translated: This means surrounded by a garland of three-pointed vajras.

original: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
translated: Adorned with eight pillars.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi cha re re zhing rtsig pa la brten pa'i rdo rje ka ba gnyis gnyis yod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi cha re re zhing rtsig pa la brten pa'i rdo rje ka ba gnyis gnyis yod pa de'i phyir /
translated: This means that in each of the cardinal directions, there are two vajra pillars supporting the wall.

original: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
translated: It is beautified by eight pillars.

original: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su 'ang //
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su 'ang //
translated: Inside the vajra pillars

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa //
translated: are adorned with five moon maṇḍalas.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ka ba rnams kyi mchog ste gnas dam pa yin pas na rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ka ba rnams kyi mchog ste gnas dam pa yin pas na rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas su'o //
translated: Since the vajra pillars are the best, the supreme place, it is in the place of the best vajra pillars.

original: rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas de rnams su /
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas de rnams su /
translated: In those places of the best vajra pillars,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'do dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i gnas rnams su ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zlum po lnga'i thig btab la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'do dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i gnas rnams su ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zlum po lnga'i thig btab la /
translated: the Bhagavān Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi are marked with five round sun maṇḍalas.

original: yang re re zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga yod pa'i rdo rje rim mos yongs su bskor bar thig btab la /
analyzed: yang re re zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga yod pa'i rdo rje rim mos yongs su bskor bar thig btab la /
translated: Each of them is marked with five moon maṇḍalas, completely surrounded by vajras in stages.

original: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
analyzed: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
translated: It has four corners and four doors,

original: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas shing /
analyzed: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas shing /
translated: is beautified by eight pillars,

original: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor bar //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor bar //
translated: and is completely surrounded by a vajra garland.

original: dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the central maṇḍala.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor che na po'i cha bgo ba mdzad pa yin pas the tshom mi bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor che na po'i cha bgo ba mdzad pa yin pas the tshom mi bya'o //
translated: Here, the Blessed One, in the Vajraśekhara Tantra, divided the great maṇḍala of the Vajra Realm. Therefore, one should not doubt it.

original: 'dir yang de'i 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bstan pa ni 'khor @111a * //🔽lo ltar zlum po yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang de'i 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bstan pa ni 'khor @111a * // lo ltar zlum po yin te /
translated: Here, the statement “like its wheel” means that it is round like a wheel.

original: 'dir zlum po kho na yin no zhes bstan par nus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir zlum po kho na yin no zhes bstan par nus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, it is not possible to demonstrate that it is only round.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin par bshad //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin par bshad //
translated: The maṇḍala is explained to be a wheel.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: spyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin bar bshad pas des ba med la /
analyzed: spyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin bar bshad pas des ba med la /
translated: Here, in general, the maṇḍala is explained to be a wheel, so there is no contradiction.

original: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bas //
analyzed: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bas //
translated: It is completely surrounded by vajra lines.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dis kyang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dis kyang /
translated: And by this statement,

original: 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood that it is different.

original: de yang / gru bzhi ra bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
analyzed: de yang / gru bzhi ra bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
translated: And that is also: One should make a square with four gates, beautified by four porticos,

original: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
analyzed: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
translated: It is completely surrounded by vajra lines.

original: rdo rje pho brang chen po bri //
analyzed: rdo rje pho brang chen po bri //
translated: Draw the great vajra palace.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yang thig gi cho ga gsal bar byas te /
analyzed: yang thig gi cho ga gsal bar byas te /
translated: Again, the ritual of the lines is clarified.

original: de la dang po ras ba la rin la mi brtsegs par nyos la /
analyzed: de la dang po ras ba la rin la mi brtsegs par nyos la /
translated: There, first, having purchased cloth without regard for price,

original: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu /
analyzed: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu /
translated: a thread spun by a pure girl,

original: tshon rtsi dri zhim po /
analyzed: tshon rtsi dri zhim po /
translated: fragrant colors,

original: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar pos so sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag pa la /🔽h'um h'um hr'i:aa: a'a zhes bya ba'i rang gi sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
analyzed: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar pos so sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag pa la / h'um h'um hr'i:aa: a'a zhes bya ba'i rang gi sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
translated: blue, yellow, red, green, and white, having dyed them individually, having arranged them in this very order,🔽with the seed syllables of one's own, namely, HŪḤ HŪḤ HṚĪḤ Ā Ā, having placed Akṣobhya and so forth on the thread,

original: d'i pti shti am ku sha dza: zhes bya ba /
analyzed: d'i pti shti am ku sha dza: zhes bya ba /
translated: with the words DĪPṬI ŚATĪ AṄKUŚA JAḤ,

original: mig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: mig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: having placed them in the two eyes,

original: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
analyzed: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
translated: the eyes that are very agitated and blazing, the eyes that lead the eye pupils,

original: zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces brjod pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces brjod pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
translated: One should summon Akṣobhya and so on.

original: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis srad bu btang ba 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug la /
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis srad bu btang ba 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug la /
translated: Then, the lines released by the light of the individual seed syllables of Akṣobhya and so on are summoned by the view of blazing.

original: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu bkang nas /🔽aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharmm'a:sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbha dharmma /
analyzed: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu bkang nas / aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharmm'a:sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbha dharmma /
translated: Having filled the line in one's hand,🔽one should recite:🔽 All phenomena are mutually interpenetrated, mutually intermingled,🔽and mutually absorbed.

original: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmma /
analyzed: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmma /
translated: All phenomena are extremely absorbed.

original: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ, one should roll it.

original: ma dang ta gnyis kyis mig g-yas pa dang / g-yon par zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la /
analyzed: ma dang ta gnyis kyis mig g-yas pa dang / g-yon par zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la /
translated: With the two syllables ma and ta, one should generate the moon and sun in the right and left eyes,

original: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
analyzed: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
translated: and having stabilized them with vajra-sight mat,

original: thig de gser la sogs pa'i snod dris byugs par bzhag la /
analyzed: thig de gser la sogs pa'i snod dris byugs par bzhag la /
translated: Place that line in a vessel of gold, etc., anointed with scent.

original: dri dad me tog dang spos kyis legs par mchod nas rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la /
analyzed: dri dad me tog dang spos kyis legs par mchod nas rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la /
translated: Having made offerings with scent, flowers, and incense, hold it with the vajra-bond.🔽Recite the mantra of Vajrasattva one hundred and eight times:

original: aom badzra sa ma ya bra s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad @111b bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya bra s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad @111b bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-samaya-pra-sūtraṃ mati-krama hūṃ

original: de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris dkyil 'khor gyi sa yang byugs la /
analyzed: de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris dkyil 'khor gyi sa yang byugs la /
translated: Then, anoint the ground of the maṇḍala with the scent of the recitation of the sixteen sattvas.

original: ma tog gis kun nas mdzes par byas nas bang snang na bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phal te /
analyzed: ma tog gis kun nas mdzes par byas nas bang snang na bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phal te /
translated: Having made it beautiful with flowers, offer water for the feet to all the families residing in the sky.

original: me tog ma la sogs pa dang / sbeg mo la sogs pas thams cad yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dza:gnyis la nyi ma dad zla ba mdog ser por snang ba bskyed la /
analyzed: me tog ma la sogs pa dang / sbeg mo la sogs pas thams cad yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dza:gnyis la nyi ma dad zla ba mdog ser por snang ba bskyed la /
translated: Having made offerings with all the offerings of Puṣpā, etc., and Gaurī, etc., and having bowed down, generate the sun and moon in the right and left eyes, appearing as yellow light, with the two syllables jriṃ.

original: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
translated: Having made offerings of song and music, one should examine the maṇḍala.

original: de la re zhig tshon kha dog dkar po dri zhim pa la /
analyzed: de la re zhig tshon kha dog dkar po dri zhim pa la /
translated: First, the chalk line should be fragrant white color.

original: sngags bzlas la thig sbang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas la thig sbang bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting the mantra, it should be moistened.

original: de nas yid kyis badzra dh'a tu zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod la /
analyzed: de nas yid kyis badzra dh'a tu zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod la /
translated: Then, mentally reciting the vajra word vajradhātu,

original: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur na /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur na /
translated: if one becomes Vairocana,

original: badzra karmma h'um zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga nas rdo rje las su sgrub pa'i grogs mchog sprul par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra karmma h'um zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga nas rdo rje las su sgrub pa'i grogs mchog sprul par bya'o //
translated: reciting vajrakarma hūṃ, one should emanate from one’s heart a vajra karma supreme assistant.

original: de nas badzra satva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
analyzed: de nas badzra satva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
translated: Then, reciting vajrasattva, imagining oneself as Vajrasattva,

original: thig de g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la dza: zhes bya bas de rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag par thig gtad la /
analyzed: thig de g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la dza: zhes bya bas de rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag par thig gtad la /
translated: holding the chalk line with the left fist, one should give the chalk line to the hand of the supreme assistant in the form of Vajrakarma with jaḥ.

original: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom zhing shar du bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom zhing shar du bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Visualizing all directions as equal, facing east, one should lay down the Brahmā line.

original: de nas yang slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas yang slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug la /
translated: Then, the master should sit in the south,

original: byang phyogs su bltas te gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs su bltas te gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having looked to the north, one should lay down the second line.

original: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste /
analyzed: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste /
translated: Again, having sat in the direction of fire,

original: byang phyogs su bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs su bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: having looked to the north, one should lay down the eastern line of the outer maṇḍala.

original: rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la lho'i phyogs su bltas te /
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la lho'i phyogs su bltas te /
translated: Having sat in the direction of wind, having looked to the south,

original: nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should lay down the western line.

original: de nyid du 'dug la shar du bltas te byang gi thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid du 'dug la shar du bltas te byang gi thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having sat in that very place, having looked to the east, one should lay down the northern line.

original: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste nub tu bltas la lho'i phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
analyzed: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste nub tu bltas la lho'i phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
translated: Again, having sat in the direction of fire, having looked to the west, one should lay down the southern line.

original: de bzhin du kha khyer gyi thi ga kyang gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du kha khyer gyi thi ga kyang gdab par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should lay down the lines of the ledges.

original: de ltar na phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang nang gi dkyil 'khor kun du thig btab nas byang du bltas te shar gyi ka ba'i thig gdab bo //🔽lhor bltas te nub kyi ka ba'i thig gdab po //
analyzed: de ltar na phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang nang gi dkyil 'khor kun du thig btab nas byang du bltas te shar gyi ka ba'i thig gdab bo // lhor bltas te nub kyi ka ba'i thig gdab po //
translated: In this way, having laid down the lines all around the outer maṇḍala and the inner maṇḍala, having looked to the north, one should lay down the line of the eastern pillar.🔽Having looked to the south, one should lay down the line of the western pillar.

original: shar du bltas te byang gi ka ba'i thig gdab bo //
analyzed: shar du bltas te byang gi ka ba'i thig gdab bo //
translated: Having looked to the east, one should lay down the line of the northern pillar.

original: nub tu bltas te lho'i ka ba'i thig gdab bo //🔽yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su 'dug ste rlung gi mtshams kyi @112a * //
analyzed: nub tu bltas te lho'i ka ba'i thig gdab bo // yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su 'dug ste rlung gi mtshams kyi @112a * //
translated: Having looked to the west, one should lay down the line of the southern pillar.🔽Again, having sat in the southeast corner, one should lay down the line from the southeast to the southwest.

original: bar dang bden bral gyi mtshams su 'dug ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bar dang bden bral gyi mtshams su 'dug ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having sat in the southwest corner, one should lay down the line from the southwest to the northwest.

original: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog ni thams cad du bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog ni thams cad du bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: The master and the best of assistants should go around in all directions.

original: de la thig gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la thig gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mantra for laying down the lines is this:

original: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma t'i kra ma h'um zhes slob dpon gyis bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma t'i kra ma h'um zhes slob dpon gyis bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Om vajra samaya sutra mam tra hum.  The master should recite this.

original: dza:dza:dza: zhes bya ba dza:gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis thig drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dza:dza:dza: zhes bya ba dza:gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis thig drang bar bya'o //
translated: With Jham jham jham, the best of assistants should draw the lines with three jhams.

original: sgo ni dbus kyi brgyad cha'o //
analyzed: sgo ni dbus kyi brgyad cha'o //
translated: The door is one eighth of the center.

original: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad do //
analyzed: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad do //
translated: The door frame is the size of the door.

original: kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
analyzed: kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
translated: The ledge is half the size of the door.

original: sgo 'gram ni kha khyer gyi tshad do //
analyzed: sgo 'gram ni kha khyer gyi tshad do //
translated: The door threshold is the size of the ledge.

original: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the five-colored line is half the size of the ledge.

original: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
translated: The archways are three times the size of the gates.🔽The inner maṇḍala is half the size of the outer maṇḍala, with four gates and four corners, completely surrounded by a ledge, and well marked with eight pillars.

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la sgo bzhi pa zur bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan par legs par thig btab nas seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la sgo bzhi pa zur bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan par legs par thig btab nas seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu /
translated: The lower part of the acacia stake is like a single-pointed vajra,

original: stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu la /🔽rdo rje phur bu'i sngags yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu la / rdo rje phur bu'i sngags yongs su bzlas te /
translated: and the upper part is like a five-pointed vajra.🔽Recite the vajra stake mantra

original: rdo rjes brdungs la /🔽de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du /🔽rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rdo rjes brdungs la / de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du / rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
translated: and strike with the vajra.🔽With the string tied to that,🔽beginning from the northeast,

original: bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: the vajra garland should be measured outside the inner maṇḍala.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis bton la /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis bton la /
translated: Then, the stake that is placed in the center of the maṇḍala is extracted with the four hūṃs.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por byas nas /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por byas nas /
translated: Having filled the hole of the dagger with the five-colored powder explained below, make it level.

original: h'i zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang g-yon du nyi ma dad zla ba bskyed la /
analyzed: h'i zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang g-yon du nyi ma dad zla ba bskyed la /
translated: With the syllable “hai” generate the sun and moon in the right and left eyes.

original: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams bya'o //
translated: Looking all around with the wrathful gaze, one should make the doors.

original: thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the procedure for laying out the lines.

original: thig de tshon gyis dgang ba dang / tshon gyi rim pa ni 'di'i 'og nas dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thig de tshon gyis dgang ba dang / tshon gyi rim pa ni 'di'i 'og nas dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: The filling in of the lines with powder and the sequence of the colors should be understood from the second chapter below.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the central maṇḍala

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing //
translated: one should place the form of the Buddha.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The Bhagavān Vairocana.

original: de'i shar gyi phyogs kyi char rdo rje sems ma /
analyzed: de'i shar gyi phyogs kyi char rdo rje sems ma /
translated: To his east one should draw Vajraratnā,

original: lhor rin chen sems ma /
analyzed: lhor rin chen sems ma /
translated: to the south Ratnasaṃbhavā,

original: nub tu chos kyi sems ma /
analyzed: nub tu chos kyi sems ma /
translated: to the west Dharmasneha,

original: byang du las kyi sems ma bri bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
analyzed: byang du las kyi sems ma bri bar bya'o // rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
translated: and to the north Karmavajra.🔽Having gone there with the vajra speed,

original: zhes bya ba ni de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin no //
translated: the vajra speed is as follows.

original: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
analyzed: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
translated: Having lifted up the picture with the mind,

original: rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan @112b yang rung //
analyzed: rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan @112b yang rung //
translated: whether with the vajra thread or otherwise,

original: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
analyzed: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
translated: having gone outside and entered inside,

original: dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur //
translated: one does not transgress the commitments.

original: de nas 'di'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas 'di'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
translated: Then, its essence is this:

original: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vega-krama hūṃ.

original: mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the mandala of Akṣobhya,🔽Vajradhara and so forth are equipoised.

original: rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje legs pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: This means that one should draw the Blessed One Akṣobhya, Vajrasattva, Vajrarāja, Vajrarāga, and Vajratejas.

original: de ltar na de dang mnyam par gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na de dang mnyam par gyur te /

analyzed: thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rna bzhin nyid kyis ni mi mnyam pa med pas mnyam pa'o //

original: rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the mandala of Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs bar gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //

translated: This means that one should draw the Blessed One Ratnasaṃbhava, the vajra jewel, the vajra sun, the vajra banner, and the vajra smile.

original: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, that maṇḍala will be filled with the vajra heart and so forth.

original: tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor du ;
analyzed: tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor du ;
translated: In the maṇḍala of Amitāyus,🔽the pure vajra eye and so forth are to be placed.

original: / rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldas 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang / rdo rje smra ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag / ces bya ba ni bcom ldas 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang / rdo rje smra ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: This means that one should draw the Blessed One Amitābha, the vajra dharma, the vajra sharpness, the vajra cause, and the vajra speech.

original: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na dkyil 'khor de dag par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, that maṇḍala will be pure.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas kyang de dag yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas kyang de dag yin no //

original: gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the maṇḍala of Acalanātha,🔽the vajra body and so forth are to be placed.

original: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag / ces bya ba la rdo rje rgya gram ni rdo rje las te /
analyzed: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag / ces bya ba la rdo rje rgya gram ni rdo rje las te /
translated: The vajra cross, etc., are placed means that the vajra cross is the vajra action.

analyzed: gang du de nyid la sogs pa yod pa de ni rdo rje rgya gram la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavat Amoghasiddhi, the variegated vajra, the vajra protector, the vajra yaksha, and the vajra fist should be drawn.

original: 'khor lo yi ni grva rnams su //
analyzed: 'khor lo yi ni grva rnams su //

analyzed: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams me'i phyogs nas brtsams te /
translated: the vajra goddesses are also placed means that, beginning from the southeast corner of the inner mandala,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor phyi yi grva rnams su //
translated: In the corners of the outer mandala,🔽the four goddesses of the retinue are also placed means that, beginning from the southeast corner of the outer mandala,🔽 the goddess Puṣpā, the goddess Dhūpā, the goddess Ālokā, and the goddess Gandhā should be drawn.

original: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i me'i phyogs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i me'i phyogs nas brtsams te /
translated: Beginning from the southeast corner of the outer mandala deity platform,

analyzed: bskor phyogs su bdug pa ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / byug pa ma bri bar bya'o // sgo @113a * //
translated: one should draw the incense lady, the flower lady, the lamp lady, and the perfume lady in a clockwise direction.

original: rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
analyzed: rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
translated: In the inner part of all the doors

original: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi //
analyzed: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun gyi zhes bya ba'i tshig gis phyi dang thams cad kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu /

analyzed: nub tu lcags sgrog / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa bri bar bya'o //

original: 'khor lo phyi rim phyogs su ni //
analyzed: 'khor lo phyi rim phyogs su ni //
translated: In the outer circle of the mandala

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /

analyzed: ces bya ba ni khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams phri bar bya'o //
translated: In the inner courtyard one should draw Maitreya and so forth, the bodhisattvas of the fortunate eon.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po /

analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa ;
translated: He holds a five-pronged vajra with the mudrā of supreme enlightenment.

analyzed: seng ge'i gdan la padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /

analyzed: dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bsnams pa rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /

original: zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa /

original: zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o //

original: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Similarly, Akṣobhya and so forth are, in order,

analyzed: sku mdog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding gi khri la padma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /

translated: He makes the earth-touching gesture, the boon-granting gesture, the gesture of supreme meditative concentration, and the gesture of fearlessness. He holds a vajra, a jewel, a lotus, and a crossed vajra.

original: nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can /

original: rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /

original: zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs pa ste /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i spyi'i snying po zlos shing bri ba'am bzhag la /

analyzed: bar snang la bzhugs pa phab ste gcig tu bya'o //

original: de bzhin du satva badzri zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du satva badzri zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: badzra aa be sha zhes bya ba'i bar zlos shing /
translated: one should draw or place the five transcendent lords.

analyzed: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bri ba'am bzhag la /

analyzed: bar snang na bzhugs pa phab ste /

analyzed: gzugs brnyan dang lhan cig tu bya'o //

translated: Vajrasattva is on a lotus and moon seat, with a red five-pointed vajra. One should understand that the seats of Vajraratna and so on are also like that.

analyzed: der rdo rje rin chen ma ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o //
translated: There, Vajraratna is a wish-fulfilling jewel, with a five-pointed vajra at the top.

original: rdo rje chos ma ni padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa /
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma ni padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa /

original: mdog dkar dmar /
analyzed: mdog dkar dmar /
translated: red in color.

original: 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa /
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa /

analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad gyen du gyes pa kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje las ma ni sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa kha dog lnga pa ste /

original: de la dbus ni dkar po /
analyzed: de la dbus ni dkar po /

analyzed: mdun sngon po / g-yas logs ser po / rgyab dmar po /

analyzed: g-yon margad mdog can no //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar dag kyang padma dang zla ba'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin te /
translated: Vajrasattva and so on, up to the Bodhisattvas of the Good Kalpa, are seated in the vajra posture on lotuses and moons.

original: rdo rje sems sogs dang po'i mgon //
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs dang po'i mgon //
translated: Vajrasattva and so on, the first lords,

original: rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: are seated on half-vajra seats.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is explained.

analyzed: de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul du dkur brten pa /

analyzed: phyag g-yas pa kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgyar bzhag pa'i gung mo la dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
translated: The right hand is placed in the katvanga mudra, with the middle finger holding a five-pointed first at the heart, as if praising himself.

analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po ni gser gyi mdog can rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //

translated: Vajrasādhu is the color of emerald and holds a vajra fist in both hands, with which he makes the gesture of granting boon and delights all the tathāgatas.

analyzed: rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas na rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil lhor bsnams te /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snang ba mdzad pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snang ba mdzad pa /

original: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //

original: rdo rje rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i @114a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i @114a * //

analyzed: mdog can phyag g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan phyag g-yon gdan la brten par bzhugs pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa dung dang padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba /
translated: Vajrahasita is white like a conch or lotus root,

analyzed: phyag g-yas kyis so'i phreng ba gnyis kyi rtse mo na rdo rje yod pa bsnams te /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dzum pa la nges par sbyor ba / phyag g-yon gdan la brten pas bzhugs pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g-yon pa dkur brten pas rdo rje padma bzung ste /

analyzed: phyag g-yas pas de'i 'dab ma rang gi thugs kar 'byed pa'o //

original: rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g-yon gyis rang gi thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g-yon gyis rang gi thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa /

original: g-yas kyis ral gri bsnams pa ste /
analyzed: g-yas kyis ral gri bsnams pa ste /
translated: His right hand holds a sword.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He is seated in the manner of striking all tathāgatas.

analyzed: rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyi gung mo'i rtse mo na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor bar mdzad pa /
translated: Vajra Cause is the color of gold. With the tip of his right index finger he turns an eight-spoked wheel.

original: g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: His left hand rests on his lap.

original: rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje lce bsnams nas /
analyzed: rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog can phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje lce bsnams nas /
translated: Vajra Speech is the color of copper. With his right hand he holds a vajra tongue.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang smra bar mdzad cing /🔽g-yon gdan la brten pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang smra bar mdzad cing / g-yon gdan la brten pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He speaks to the tathāgatas.🔽His left hand rests on his lap.

original: rdo rje las zhal dkar po /
analyzed: rdo rje las zhal dkar po /

original: rked pa'i bar dang phyag gnyis sngo skya /
analyzed: rked pa'i bar dang phyag gnyis sngo skya /

original: lhag ma mdog sngo /
analyzed: lhag ma mdog sngo /

original: zhal gyi 'og logs nas rked pa'i bar du dmar skya /
analyzed: zhal gyi 'og logs nas rked pa'i bar du dmar skya /
translated: From the underside of his face to his waist is light red.

original: brla gnyis ser skya /
analyzed: brla gnyis ser skya /
translated: His two thighs are light yellow.

original: lhag ma byin pa gnyis nas zhabs kyi bar du dkar po /🔽phyag g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis 'jog pa /
analyzed: lhag ma byin pa gnyis nas zhabs kyi bar du dkar po / phyag g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis 'jog pa /
translated: The rest of his body, from his two calves to his feet, is white.🔽His left vajra fist holds a multicolored vajra and bell in a gesture of arrogance.

original: phyag g-yas kyi gung mo la sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas kyi gung mo la sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
