original: sngon po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //🔽rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag bya zhes bya'i /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ni ma yin no // rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag bya zhes bya'i /
translated: not blue, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the seal of Citta-vajri is to be made with the pledge seal of the family, and not with the seal of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas bcing ngo //
analyzed: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas bcing ngo //
translated: Then, with the words, samaya-sattva, one binds it.

original: de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing zhes bya ba ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya de nyid gung mo'i sor mo gnyis phreng ba 'dzin du @124a * //
analyzed: de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing zhes bya ba ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya de nyid gung mo'i sor mo gnyis phreng ba 'dzin du @124a * //
translated: The straight one is the gesture of Cittavajri, that is, the same gesture of Cittavajri, with the two index fingers forming a flower garland.

original: gzhug pa'o // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhug pa'o // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: Now you have entered the family of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod par grub pa'o ;
translated: All the Tathagatas are Vairocana, Akshobhya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi.

original: / de rnams kyi rigs ni de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas /
analyzed: / de rnams kyi rigs ni de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas /
translated: Their family is the nature that produces them,

original: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul te /
translated: the method of Cittavajri and so forth.

original: de las bskyed pa ni rigs so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bskyed pa ni rigs so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said that what is produced from that is the family.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'di dag tu khyed phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa dag gis zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'di dag tu khyed phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa dag gis zhugs pa ste /
translated: You have entered into these families of all the Tathagatas by the outer and inner entry.

original: de las ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni phyi'i'o //
analyzed: de las ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni phyi'i'o //
translated: By this maya hum, the entry into the mandala of colored powders is the outer entry.

original: de bzhin du sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes babs pa ni gsang ba'i 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes babs pa ni gsang ba'i 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Similarly, by this samaya hum, the descent of the gnosis of all the Tathagatas is the secret entry.🔽Thus, it is stated in the Vajrashekhara Tantra:

original: de skad du yangs ma ya h'um zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab par bya'o zhes rtse mo las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de skad du yangs ma ya h'um zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab par bya'o zhes rtse mo las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: By this maya hum, the gnosis of all the Tathagatas should descend.

original: ngas khyed la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes te sa dang po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
analyzed: ngas khyed la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes te sa dang po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
translated: I will generate in you the vajra gnosis, which is the nature of the first stage and so forth.

original: can gyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya zhing mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: can gyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya zhing mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes bod pa'o //
translated: The meaning of one should generate and actualize the indivisible pristine consciousness of the person is as follows:

original: de nyid kyi khyad par ni ye shes gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //🔽khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams lam smra shig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni phyi dang gsang ba'i lta bas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid la smra bar bya zhing
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par ni ye shes gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to // khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams lam smra shig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni phyi dang gsang ba'i lta bas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid la smra bar bya zhing
translated: The difference between those is shown by the phrase “the pristine consciousness by which . . .”🔽“Do not speak of the path to those who have not seen the great maṇḍala.🔽Otherwise, the samaya will be violated” means that one should speak only to those who have seen the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm through the outer and inner views.🔽“The great maṇḍala of the vajra realm is like this” should not be spoken or explained to others who have not entered here and have not seen the maṇḍala.

original: bshad par bya'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes 'dir ma zhugs shing dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba gzhan dag la yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes gtam tsam yang mi bya'o
analyzed: bshad par bya'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes 'dir ma zhugs shing dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba gzhan dag la yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes gtam tsam yang mi bya'o
translated: “The great maṇḍala of the vajra realm is like this” should not be spoken even as a joke.

original: // gang gi phyir rnal 'byor dang bya ba dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud rnams las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: // gang gi phyir rnal 'byor dang bya ba dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud rnams las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid gtso bo yin no //
translated: Because this very Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm is the principal one among the tantras of Yoga, Kriya, and Carya.

original: de skad du yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de skad du yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
translated: Thus it is said in the Sarva-guhya-tantra:

original: rdo rje dbyings @124b ni dga' chen por //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings @124b ni dga' chen por //
translated: The Vajra Realm is the Great Joy.

original: mkhas pa gang zhig dbang bskur zhing //
analyzed: mkhas pa gang zhig dbang bskur zhing //
translated: The wise one who is consecrated

original: rtag tu gsang ba'i nor ldan pa //
analyzed: rtag tu gsang ba'i nor ldan pa //
translated: and always possesses the secret wealth

original: de la mkhas pas bshad par bya //
analyzed: de la mkhas pas bshad par bya //
translated: to him the wise one should explain.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mngon par 'byung pa las kyang 'khor los skyur ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de yang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'i /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mngon par 'byung pa las kyang 'khor los skyur ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de yang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'i /
translated: And in the noble Vajra-samaya-abhyudaya, it is said that one who is consecrated in the mandala of the wheel-turning, etc. is said to possess the consecration of knowledge.

original: 'dir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon nyid yin no //
translated: But here, by possessing the consecration of glorious Vajrasattva, one is the master of all mandalas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / chos la sogs par dbang bskur ba yang rang gi dkyil 'khor tsam gyi slob dpon nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / chos la sogs par dbang bskur ba yang rang gi dkyil 'khor tsam gyi slob dpon nyid yin no //
translated: Also, the consecration as a Tathagata, a vajra, a Dharma, and so on is the consecration as a master of one's own mandala.🔽And those who are consecrated in other mandalas also possess the consecration of knowledge.

original: dkyil 'khor gzhan du dbang bskur ba de dag kyang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gzhan du dbang bskur ba de dag kyang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has said.

original: de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa dang dbang bskur bas ni gsang sngags kyi tshul thams cad nye bar ston par rung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa dang dbang bskur bas ni gsang sngags kyi tshul thams cad nye bar ston par rung ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, one who has entered the great mandala of the vajra realm and has been consecrated is fit to teach all the methods of mantra.

original: gzhan dag tu ni rang gi tshul kho na ston pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag tu ni rang gi tshul kho na ston pa tsam yin no //
translated: But in other mandalas, one is fit to teach only one's own method.

original: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes 'og nas bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes 'og nas bshad pa ni /
translated: The following passage from below, Do not let your sacred commitments deteriorate, and This is your vajra sacred commitment. If you tell anyone, your head will split open,

original: khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar ma byed cig ces bsgo ba'o //
analyzed: khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar ma byed cig ces bsgo ba'o //
translated: Do not transgress your sacred pledge.

original: kha nang du bltas pa dang phyir bstan pa zhes bya ba ni kha thur du bstan la /
analyzed: kha nang du bltas pa dang phyir bstan pa zhes bya ba ni kha thur du bstan la /
translated: “Looking inward and outward” means looking downward.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng //
translated: “Today Vajrasattva himself

original: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: will truly enter into your heart.”

original: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing /
translated: This means that you should form the seal of Cittavajra, recite Samaya Hūṃ,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de khyod kyi snying la yang dag par zhugs te zla ba'i rdo rje'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de khyod kyi snying la yang dag par zhugs te zla ba'i rdo rje'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: and imagine that the Blessed One Vajrasattva himself enters into your heart and resides there in the manner of the moon’s reflection in water.

original: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
analyzed: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
translated: “If you speak of this method,

original: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he will immediately split your heart and depart.”

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs snying la zhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi snying dral nas gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs snying la zhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi snying dral nas gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bod pa'o //
translated: This means that Vajrasattva, who has entered your heart in the form of the Bodhisattva Vajra, will split your heart and depart if you speak of this method.

original: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: From now on, you are Vajrapani, he says.

original: deng zhes bya ba ni dus 'di nas bzung ste khyod ces bya ba khyod nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: deng zhes bya ba ni dus 'di nas bzung ste khyod ces bya ba khyod nyid kyi'o //
translated: Now means from this time on. You means you yourself.

original: nga yin zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid do //🔽phyag na @125a * //
analyzed: nga yin zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid do // phyag na @125a * //
translated: I means myself.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba yang de 'dra'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba yang de 'dra'o //
translated: Vajrapani means Vajrasattva, just as he is.

original: de bas na khyod kyis nga'i bsgo ba bya dgos so //
analyzed: de bas na khyod kyis nga'i bsgo ba bya dgos so //
translated: Therefore, you must do what I say.

original: khyod kyis ngal tshul khrims 'chal ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas smod cing brnyas par ma byed cig pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis ngal tshul khrims 'chal ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas smod cing brnyas par ma byed cig pa'o //
translated: Do not disparage or insult me by saying, You are immoral, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir brnyas par byed na mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir brnyas par byed na mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Because if you disparage me, you will die without having given up unhappiness, and will fall into the hells, he says.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis smras pa dang / slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis smras pa dang / slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: The master says, All tathāgatas, empower me, and may Vajrasattva descend upon me. The disciple says, All tathāgatas, empower me, and may Vajrasattva descend upon me.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽tha mal pa'i gzugs bsal la /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te / tha mal pa'i gzugs bsal la /
translated: This is the meaning.🔽The ordinary form is removed, and the disciple says, May all tathāgatas empower me with the form of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzod cig / de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig zhugs par gyur cig ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzod cig / de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig zhugs par gyur cig ces bya ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, May Vajrasattva descend upon me, means May Vajrasattva enter me.

original: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then the vajra master says, Quickly,

original: bya ba gzhan bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba gzhan bkag pa yin no //
translated: which means that other activities are prohibited.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having formed the seal of Sattvavajri,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gung mo gnyis myu gur bsgreng ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje ste bcing ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gung mo gnyis myu gur bsgreng ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje ste bcing ba'o //
translated: The two middle fingers of Vajrasattva are extended like sprouts, the gesture of Vajrasattva.

original: 'di de rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
analyzed: 'di de rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
translated: This is the pledge of the vajra,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: gang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ni nga'i lag pas de'i tshul du byas pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: gang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ni nga'i lag pas de'i tshul du byas pa 'di yin no //
translated: the pledge of the five-pronged vajra of the Blessed Vajrasattva is this very gesture made by my hand.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
translated: It is renowned as Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba ni gang 'di nga'i lag pas de'i tshul du byas pa 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags shing bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang 'di nga'i lag pas de'i tshul du byas pa 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags shing bshad do //
translated: means this very gesture made by my hand is renowned and explained as Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje ye shes ni sar nges pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes ni sar nges pa'o //
translated: Vajra wisdom is the ascertainment of the stage.

original: 'di nyid mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
analyzed: 'di nyid mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
translated: Since this is the supreme,

original: bla med ba ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla med ba ni zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the unsurpassed.

original: de ring nyid du zhes bya ba ni da lta kho na'o //
analyzed: de ring nyid du zhes bya ba ni da lta kho na'o //
translated: Today itself means right now.

original: 'bab par shog ces bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'bab cing zhugs bar gyur cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: 'bab par shog ces bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'bab cing zhugs bar gyur cig ces pa'o //
translated: May it descend means may it descend and enter into this very one.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang la steng du sdigs mdzub kyi tshul du gzhag pa ni 'dir khro bo'i khu tshur zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang la steng du sdigs mdzub kyi tshul du gzhag pa ni 'dir khro bo'i khu tshur zhes bya ste /
translated: The angry fist is the left vajra fist with the index finger extended and placed above in the form of a threatening forefinger, which is called here the angry fist.

original: de bcings la lag pa g-yas pas khu tshur bcangs te /
analyzed: de bcings la lag pa g-yas pas khu tshur bcangs te /
translated: Having made that, the right hand is made into a fist.

original: @125b mthe bo'i 'og tu mdzub mo gtang la /
analyzed: @125b mthe bo'i 'og tu mdzub mo gtang la /
translated: The index finger is placed under the thumb.

original: gung mo'i tshigs bar mar mnan te /
analyzed: gung mo'i tshigs bar mar mnan te /
translated: The middle finger is pressed at the middle joint.

original: gung mo brgyad la gyen du bsgreng nas gzhag pa 'di ni 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: gung mo brgyad la gyen du bsgreng nas gzhag pa 'di ni 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The middle finger is extended upward and placed. This is here the mind vajrī.

original: 'di la sdar bshad pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur de drangs shing dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la sdar bshad pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur de drangs shing dral bar bya'o //
translated: The angry fist explained here is drawn and released.

original: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Mahāyāna realization is

original: badzra sa tva aa:aa:aa: zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya brjod pa'o //
analyzed: badzra sa tva aa:aa:aa: zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya brjod pa'o //
translated: the vajra words vajrasatva aḥ aḥ aḥ, repeated one hundred times.

original: gzhan dag ni yin ge brgya pa yin no zhes zer mod kyi /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni yin ge brgya pa yin no zhes zer mod kyi /
translated: Others say it is the one hundred syllables.

original: de ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir de ni brtan par byed pa'i snying po yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir de ni brtan par byed pa'i snying po yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: Some say that is not so, because that is the essence that stabilizes it.

original: de nas babs te zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de nas babs te zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs par mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
translated: Then, having removed the blindfold, he should show the maṇḍala.🔽Having made him hold the seal of Cittavajrā, he should release it at his heart with tiṣṭha vajra and so forth.

original: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcing du bcug la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying gar dgrol du gzhug go //
analyzed: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcing du bcug la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying gar dgrol du gzhug go //
translated: Having made him hold the seal of Vajrasattva, he should release it at his head with vajrasattva tiṣṭha hūṃ.

original: rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri chu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri chu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Having made him hold the seal of Vajrarāja, he should release it at his throat with vajrarāja hūṃ.

original: slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Having made him hold the seal of Vajrarāga, he should release it at his heart with vajrarāga hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrasādhu, he should release it at his navel with vajrasādhu hūṃ.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa de bzhag la /🔽dril bu dkrol zhing /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa de bzhag la /🔽dril bu dkrol zhing /
translated: Having made him hold the seal of Vajrarakṣa, he should release it at his secret place with vajrarakṣa hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrayakṣa, he should release it at his two knees with vajrayakṣa hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrāṅkuśa, he should release it at his two wrists with vajrāṅkuśa hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrapāśa, he should release it at his two shoulders with vajrapāśa hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrasphoṭa, he should release it at his two biceps with vajrasphoṭa hūṃ.🔽 Having made him hold the seal of Vajrāveśa, he should release it at his two eyes with vajrāveśa hūṃ.

original: dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dang / mar mes yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dang / mar mes yang dag par mchod de /
translated: and with perfume, incense, flowers, food offerings, and lamps.

original: gtor ma byin nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'don zhing /
analyzed: gtor ma byin nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'don zhing /
translated: Having given the sacrificial cake, one should recite the verses of auspiciousness.

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la de dang / aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la de dang / aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken water from the victorious vase with the vajra fist, one should confer the empowerment upon the head with that and the mantra Oṃ vajrâbhiṣiñca māṃ.

original: de nas phyag rgya dang phreng ba gang yang rung ba cig bcings la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya dang phreng ba gang yang rung ba cig bcings la zhes bya ba la /
translated: Then, having formed any one of the mudras or garlands,

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga brjod par bya ste / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba yin no //
translated: one should recite the general ritual of all empowerments.🔽For all the tathāgatas, it is the empowerment conferred by the garland of the vajra jewel mudra.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa @129a * //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa @129a * //
translated: For the tathāgata families such as Śrī Vajrasattva, it is the vajradhātvīśvarī mudra,🔽and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: One is consecrated with a garland of the seals of the Buddhas.

original: rdo rje'i rigs la ni sangs rgyas kyi phreng bas te de'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng bas so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs la ni sangs rgyas kyi phreng bas te de'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng bas so //
translated: In the Vajra Family, one is consecrated with a garland of the Buddhas, that is, with a garland of them and with a garland of vajras.

original: de yang rdo rje ti r'i nt'i ri'i phyag rgya dang / dpal he ru ka'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje ti r'i nt'i ri'i phyag rgya dang / dpal he ru ka'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ro //
translated: One is consecrated with the seal of Vajra-Tīra-Mut-Tīra and with the pledge seal of Śrī Heruka.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu la ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu la ni /
translated: In the section on the conversion of beings,

original: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgyas 'od dpag tu med pas dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgyas 'od dpag tu med pas dbang bskur ro //
translated: one is consecrated by Amitābha with the seal of Vajradharma.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu la ni /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu la ni /
translated: In the section on the accomplishment of all aims,

original: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ro //
translated: one is consecrated by Vajraratna with the sprout of the vajra gem.

original: las kyi rigs la ni rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas dbang bskur ro ;
analyzed: las kyi rigs la ni rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas dbang bskur ro ;
translated: In the Action Family, one is consecrated with a garland of variegated vajras with the pledge seal of Vajrakarma.

original: / aom gyis rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la zhes bya ba ni phreng bas dbang bskur pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: / aom gyis rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la zhes bya ba ni phreng bas dbang bskur pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “Placing one’s own insignia in one’s hand with Oṃ” is immediately after the consecration with the garland.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba la ni /
translated: For the consecration of the Tathagata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu'o //
translated: the vajra of the Tathagata and the vajra bell.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba la ni /
translated: For the consecration of the Tathagata family,

original: dang pa'i rdo rje dril bu la'o //
analyzed: dang pa'i rdo rje dril bu la'o //
translated: the vajra of the Tathagata and the blazing vajra bell.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rigs la ni //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rigs la ni //
translated: For the Vajra Humkara family,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje dril bu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje dril bu 'bar ba'o //
translated: the vajra of Vajra-Yaksas and the blazing vajra bell.

original: padma'i rigs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu la ni /
analyzed: padma'i rigs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu la ni /
translated: For the lotus family, the section of the Subjugation of Beings,

original: rdo rje padma dang / rdo rje padma'i dril bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padma dang / rdo rje padma'i dril bu'o //
translated: the vajra lotus and the vajra bell of the lotus.

original: nor bu'i rigs don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu la ni /
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu la ni /
translated: For the jewel family, the section of the Accomplishment of All Aims,

original: rdo rje rin po che dang / dril bu rdo rje rin po che'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che dang / dril bu rdo rje rin po che'o //
translated: the vajra jewel and the vajra bell of the jewel.

original: las kyi rigs la ni rtse mo bcu gnyis pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang / de'i dril bu'o /
analyzed: las kyi rigs la ni rtse mo bcu gnyis pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang / de'i dril bu'o /
translated: For the action family, the twelve-spoked vajra cross and its bell.

original: dang // phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / des mtshan pa'i rdo rje dril bu ste /
analyzed: dang // phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / des mtshan pa'i rdo rje dril bu ste /
translated: For the outer vajra families, the three-pointed vajra and the vajra bell marked with it.

original: 'di dag ni rang gi mtshan ma ste /🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang gi mtshan ma ste / de dag ni /
translated: These are their own signs.🔽They are the vajra empowerment

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
translated: of the buddhas.

original: di ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur //
analyzed: di ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur //
translated: Today you will receive it.🔽Take this vajra

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir //🔽rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir // rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
translated: for the sake of the perfect accomplishment of all buddhas.

original: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzras ma ya stvam zhes bya ba 'dis lag par sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzras ma ya stvam zhes bya ba 'dis lag par sbyin par bya'o //
translated: With “Oṃ vajra adhipati satva abhiṣiñcāmi tiṣṭha vajra samaya satva,” he should give it in the hand.

original: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
analyzed: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
translated: The bodhicitta is the vajra;

original: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
analyzed: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
translated: the bell is said to be wisdom.

original: zhes gsungs pas na /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas na /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the vajra empowerment is said to be the empowerment of vajra wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kun du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “For the sake of all buddhas” means

original: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: that since this vajra empowerment is the nature of bodhicitta,

original: rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid yin no //
translated: this vajra is all the buddhas themselves.
